name: Mango Mischief
description: Mango Mischief is a turn-based, retro, role-playing game that both pays homage to, and satirizes, classic JRPGs.

name: Snak
description: Snak is Snake plus jump.

name: Sasquatchers
description: Sasquatchers is a turn-based tactical cryptozoology game. The player controls a team of fame-seeking scientist-influencers traveling through increasingly dark and creepy forest areas, trying to set up the best possible angles for photos and video of elusive cryptids.

name: Obiemnaia Istoriia
description: Free game project about the history of Russia!

name: Pale Night
description: Help Pal overcome the curse forcing him to hide from light. Explore the world of Vector and join an epic adventure through a beautiful world of shapes and colors in this tight platformer.

name: Raft
description: Raft throws you and your friends into an epic oceanic adventure! Alone or together, players battle to survive a perilous voyage across a vast sea! Gather debris, scavenge reefs and build your own floating home, but be wary of the man-eating sharks!

name: Vanished Anniversary
description:
A point and click detective game.

"On our 3rd anniversary, one thing (a case, something) happened.
The relationships with close friends started to fall out all of a sudden.
Everyone suspects me as a criminal, but their behavior is rather suspicious."

Collect evidence and interrogate the others.
The evidence and clues would begin to reveal the hidden truth of the disappeared anniversary.

name: V Rising: Razer Night Serpent Pack
description:
The Razer Night Serpent Pack was a limited promotional giveaway that unlocked 4 item crafting recipes for the Tier 1 Cape (short): Razer Serpent Wrap, Tier 2 Cape (medium): Razer Serpent Veil, Tier 3 Cape (long): Razer Serpent Mantle and Headwear: Razer Hood.

The new items can be obtained without the pack's crafting recipes as extra rare loot drops added to the game with it's announcement.

The giveaway was announced in June 2022 and repeated around Halloween the same year. The Tier 2 and 3 crafting recipes were tied to the game's normal progression, so the bosses Beatrice the Tailor and Sir Magnus the Overseer had to be defeated before they could be used.

name: Ad Astra
description: Ad Astra! (translation: "To the Stars!") is a space mod for Fabric and Forge with a focus on technology, travel and exploration. We've got everything you need to become an astronaut: rockets, space suits, space stations and machines. Why not take a stroll on the Moon? Build a self-sustaining bunker on Mars? Go mining on Venus? The entire Solar System, better yet, Milky Way, is at your disposal!

name: Silicon Scramble
description: 1st place winner of the Gunner Parade '22 game jam, Silicon Scramble is a Caravan Shooter that encourages point-blanking and self-destructing to maximize score.

name: Magical Paradise Train
description: A minigame collection set on a subway.

name: Handshakes
description: Take your brain for a walk in Handshakes, a simple yet tricksy sokoban puzzle game. Guide two hands through puzzles designed to stump, not frustate, so that they may achieve their dream of a warm, firm handshake.

name: No Place Like
description: Pour yourself a cup, take your time & enjoy. Choose a cup you'd like to have your coffee in & add in whatever else you like. This is a cozy point & click game, where you can go at your own pace - there is no end goal, make as much coffee as you like! There are also 6 hidden little coffee beans for you to find in the kitchen. Remember, there's no place like home (whatever home might mean for you).

name: Trash Taste: The Boys Order Pizza
description:
Wow! You became a guest on a great podcast! "Trash Taste", huh?

But who cares about the podcast itself, after the recording the boys got really hungry. We really should order something... Like pizza!

name: Half-Life: Urbicide
description: Half-Life: Urbicide is a 11 map single player modification for Half-Life set during the Xen invasion of Earth sometime during the events of Half-Life.

name: Tropical Resort Story
description:
Build accommodation for your guests and get those tourists coming! Make the environment even nicer and discover great travel packages to give visitors the best vacation possible. Develop the resort to make your guests' dreams come true!
On this ocean island, the sparkling sea is a huge attraction of itself. There's a huge variety of incredible fish waiting to be discovered! Try improving water quality by placing marine plants and rocks in the ocean, and releasing fish you've caught while fishing - you may attract new fishy residents!

name: Horse Riding: Breakthrough Gaming Arcade
description: Sin descripción

name: The Jumping Hot Dog: Turbo
description: Join BIG H on his exciting journey through the kitchen and make him jump!

name: Weben Blocks
description:
Connect the same numbers and get the biggest tile you can get!

Reach the highest score and share it with your friends!

name: My Dream is a Lost Memory
description: My dream is a Lost Memory is a short interactive story about having Déjà vu, realizing that this Déjà vu came to you because of a dream, and then wondering if that dream is actually a memory. It's a story about work, limitations and self-respect.

name: Cursed Exped
description: Take part in the first journey of the Cursed Exped. Your mission is to cleanse cursed items in a haunted house. Use your tools to locate and investigate items. Create a ritual area to mark your location of interest and bring items with energy there to progress through the game. Be careful though, the unknown is always watching you and waiting around every corner. Stay safe and happy investigating.

name: The Red Exile
description: The Red Exile is a Survival Horror game with procedural level generation, perks, and an AI-controlled Killer.

name: MagicShop3D
description: A twenty-year-old princess walks into a magic store to ask the owner for a favor. You will need to find the right spell to help the princess deal with her problem. Combine magic elements and solve interesting puzzles in order to cast spells on the princess, but no one knows what the outcome will be.

name: Personality Dating Sim
description: A dating simulator based on personality rather than gender or appearance.

name: Edge of the Abyss Awaken
description: "Edge of the abyss Awakening" is an adventure game that combines third-person, action, Roguelite and RPG strategy selection. Players can match different weapons, entries and talents to form various gameplays for adventurous challenges. You can play solo or in teams of up to three people.

name: Lady Thalia and the Rose of Rocroi
description: Everyone who’s anyone summers in France - which means master thief Lady Thalia is there too, attending garden parties by day and stealing masterpieces by night. Unfortunately, this holiday is less than restful, as she crosses paths with foes both old and new. Case your targets, steal works of art, and team up with your Scotland Yard nemesis in this puzzle-based Twine game.

name: Demon Slayer Tamagotchi Yukaku Edition
description: The Yukaku Edition, released in Japan in June 18th, 2022, is the third version of the Demon Slayer Tamagotchi. It features the standard version's roster plus the addition of Sumiko, Zenko, and Inoko, the courtesan disguises of Tanjiro, Zenitsu, and Inosuke.

name: Gourmet Guy's 1000 IQ Food Quiz
description: Help Gourmet Guy win the 1000 IQ Food Quiz!

name: Cooking Princess
description: In this ROMhack/mod of Paper Mario, the gameplay is similar to games like Overcooked!.

name: Super Mario Odyssey Online
description: Super Mario Odyssey Online is a mod for Super Mario Odyssey that adds online multiplayer to the game.

name: Last Bus Home
description: A short horror game where you find yourself approaching a bus stop; it is late at night and the next bus to arrive is also the last one for today, and you do not want to miss it.

name: Mega Bundle: Cats
description: Incredible! Several games in this mega bundle.

name: วีรบุรุษไร้พลัง ไข่ต้ม
description: Sin descripción

name: Tiny Tiles
description: Create a landscape of your own with towns, mountains, rivers, deserts and more. This is a cozy and relaxing landscape builder.

name: Kid's Art & Puzzle
description:
Kid’s Art Coloring Book is a coloring book game for kids with lots of beautiful drawings and tools that would help express feelings and develop creativity.
You can color pictures or draw your own masterpieces! Share your work with your family, friends and the whole world!
Puzzle Collection is a relaxing puzzle game where you can spend a lot of time. Assemble puzzles piece by piece.

name: Tile Tale
description: Tile Tale is a game about pushing tiles from a limited tile stack into a board, pushing off other tiles off of the board in the process, with the goal of making 2 by 2 combinations of the same type to gain new tiles to place.

name: Under Siege 2
description: A 2D top-down arena shooter. Immerse yourself in tank battles and defeat all enemies!

name: Hidden Industries: Top-Down 3D
description: Find the objects that are hidden on the map.

name: Astro Ike
description: Astro Ike is a 3rd Person Top Down Zombie Wave shooter. You spawn in as Astro Ike and will have to defeat waves of zombies. There are 3 levels to select from to add a variety of game play.

name: Obelixes Tower Defense
description: Welcome in this tower defense game, welcome in Obelixes Tower Defense. In this game, you have to stop waves of enemies with the help of ancient obelixes which attack hostile creatures.

name: Demon Sword: Incubus
description: Use sword and spell combos to slash and blast through hordes of attacking enemies! Guard break a bosses defenses, find an opening, then obliterate them for good with a well placed super deadly attack! Satisfying 3D side scrolling action with game-play elements inspired by fighting games!

name: Splat Cat
description: Play as an artist painting their way through self-discovery! In this puzzle platformer, you'll wield your brush to paint your own path and defeat your insecurities, doubts, and fears as an artist. Finally, defeat the personification of these insecurities in an epic boss battle and reveal the beautiful artwork you made along the way.

name: Kunai Strike
description: A cyberpunk-ninja FPS 3D-platformer. Throw kunai and teleport to them across 5 individual levels. Chain teleports with wall-runs and jumps to reach the goal in the fastest time and avoid falling to certain death along the way.

name: Fly By Knight
description: Fly and fight your way through the magically altered tree you once called home! Free your friends from the prison gems that bind them! Find all your friends to open up an escape portal and get to safety!

name: Motorcycle Travel Simulator
description: This is a casual motorcycle driving game, but also a purely realistic travel game. You can ride a motorcycle to travel in the vast open world and enjoy the magnificent scenery!

name: Traumatarium
description: A randomly generated Game Boy dungeon crawler

name: Faded Stories: Greenberg
description: Here in the city of Greenberg time is meaningless, and space is infinite. The city has endless history and yet... The whole place is fading away.

name: Waifu Crush
description: Day after day, tired of your current real life, you decide to join a virtual simulation game then change your life here. Encountering girls, making friends with them, hiring them to work for you and become a real boss!

name: The Harem Life of the Violent Swordsman!
description: Nick wants to become more handsome and stronger. On the way to become stronger, he meets Leslie, who is helpful and helpful. The powerful and beautiful Josephine and the outstanding temperament Pandora start a happy harem life.

name: Stowaway
description:
STOWAWAY is a short sci-fi point & click adventure about a lone survivor, a dead crew, and a nasty alien. Voice acting, items & puzzles.

"Star log 617.7 of the USS Starcross. Pilot Travis Walker recordin'. It appears I am the sole remaining crew member. Some unspeakable - thing - has boarded the ship on our last salvage run. Chief Engineer June Harley and Captain Ben Thomas are dead."

name: Star Revenge X: Discord Star Adventure
description:
Star Revenge X is a big Rom Hack made by BroDute and released in 2022.

It features 101 Stars.

To collect Stars, you have to collect 8 Red Coins scattered over 99 giant emotes made of quicksand.

name: Baron of Shell
description: Baron of Shell is an expert-difficulty Kaizo hack of Super Mario World focused on shell physics.

name: Medieval: Defense & Conquest
description: Unique mix of wave tower defense, war strategy, idle game, and kingdom management warrior game.

name: Minecraft: Lightyear
description: Step into Buzz Lightyear’s shoes and journey to the far reaches of space in an action-filled adventure to save your friends and crew from Zurg’s evil plans. With the help of your trusty Star Command gadgets and Space Ranger vehicles, face the dangers on the alien planet, T’Kani Prime, and steer your spaceship to victory!

name: Salad Bar Tycoon: Premium Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: The Witch's Lullaby
description: The Witch's Lullaby is a classical point and click adventure reminiscent of the King's Quest or Quest for Glory series. It was made in two weeks for AdvJam 2022, mainly to scratch a nostalgic itch for lush fantasy forests in glorious 320x200.

name: The Telwynium: Book Two
description:
The Telwynium Book Two continues directly from Book One. Don't worry, there's an in game re-cap if you haven't played it!

You've been betrayed! The magic wielding Aldor that rescued you from the hands of the shadowfell is dead. Your home town burns, and your only remaining childhood friend is held captive by those monsters, on the way to Targoth, south of the Burning Swamp.

But you are not alone. By your side is Drissa and Alethi, the two-headed Raakmiri rogue. The axe-wielding Uplander, Otarr. And of course, your army of skeletons.

The Telwynium: Book Two is an early 90s style point and click, with Sierra SCI0 style graphics, but with a fancy new-fangled point 'n click interface.

name: Among Gods! RPG Adventure
description: Sin descripción

name: Five Night's at Freddy's: The Silver Eyes Fangame
description: Five Night's at Freddy's: The Silver Eyes Fangame is a short point-&-click exploration game based on the Silver Eyes novel. Please enjoy this little tour through the atmospheric world of Charlotte's childhood. And keep an eye out! There may be a secret hidden somewhere...

name: The Dark Fever
description: A platform game mixing jumping and quests in a dark and humorous universe

name: Nirvana Pilot Yume: Deluxe Edition
description: Jump to 3080, experience romances and compete in high-speed races! All this in the atmosphere of a synth-wave soundtrack!

name: Family Chess
description: Pick your favorite Choose one of the heros and challenge other players in this family-friendly version of Chess. Thanks to the cartoony graphics, this variation can be enyojed by people of all ages.

name: Strange Investigations: Two for Solitaire - Collector's Edition
description:
An investigation into a fellow detective’s death uncovers details of his last case – and now Dana may be the next target!

The Collector's Edition includes:
- Find a hidden inheritance in the bonus game
- Replay your favorite HOPs and mini-games to earn achievements
- Complete jigsaw puzzles and unlock a secret room
- Enjoy exclusive wallpapers and music
- Unravel the mystery with the help of an official strategy guide

name: Strange Investigations: Becoming - Collector's Edition
description:
The Collector's Edition includes:
- Investigate a ghostly theft in the Bonus Chapter
- Replay your favorite HOPs and mini-games, earn achievements, and unlock the Secret Room
- Collect jigsaw pieces and journal pages to reveal even more content
- Enjoy exclusive wallpapers and music
- Never get lost with the strategy guide

name: The Wizard's Apprentice
description: A trading game for Playdate

name: The Most Desperate Angel
description:
An angel meets a woman on earth. There is trouble in heaven.

A visual novel with platformer elements.

name: Platformer Toolkit
description:
Platformer Toolkit is an interactive video essay, from the creator of Game Maker’s Toolkit.

You’ll get to see, first hand, how platformer characters are designed, as you use the toolkit to change and adjust over 30 variables that drive the hero’s movement.

Change Kit’s max speed, jump height, squash and stretch, coyote time, and more - and then play through a sample level with your chosen stats.

name: Burger Fun
description: Burger Fun is a retro rhythm game that lets the user complete a level with the controller buttons. Try to complete the level with your best time. Trophies are collected as you complete the rhythm goals. Single player fun and arcade style entertainment.

name: The Spidy D
description: The clicking adventure you and your friends need. Catch moths with the main hero of the game The Spidy D and chatch all the moths in the world!

name: The Jumping Hot Dog
description: Join BIG H on his exciting journey through the kitchen and make him jump!

name: System of Souls
description:
System of souls is a first-person puzzle and platform video game. You will control
L-064N, a soul transferred to a last robot model that will try to remember who it is
and what it does in the ION facilities with the help of Aura, the artificial intelligence of
the place, which will make it go through different tests logic with the final purpose to
stimulate your neural network and obtain the memories of L-064N.

name: Board
description: Board is a minimalist puzzle game that offers a relaxing short experience.

name: Super Stupid Game
description: The ultimate low budget stupid game that has created a big topic in Japan, the English version of "Super Stupid Game" is finally here!

name: The Hotel
description: The Hotel is a psychological horror thriller in which the player will have to face the evil living within the walls of a lonely hotel. But more importantly, the player will have to decide what this evil is to him. Maybe the nature of this evil is deeper than it seems at first glance.

name: The Looker
description:
You wake up, alone, on a strangely familiar island full of puzzles that will frustrate and annoy you.

A parody of Jonathan Blow's The Witness.

name: Hidden Desert War: Top-Down 3D
description: Find the objects that are hidden on the map.

name: Panda Parkour
description: "Panda Parkour" is a role-playing parkour game in which you play as a panda and traverse the complex terrain.

name: PearPhone.io
description: PearPhone.io is a dynamic, free 3D-Multiplayer-Shooter game with battles in realtime. Combat against other players all around the world or intelligent bots and feel unlimited action! Host private matches and have fun with your friends in exciting combats!

name: Astrocat: Skylar's Memories
description: Discover all the moments Skylar lived until she became an astrocat and broke through space in this beautiful relaxing puzzle.

name: Rich Taste of Ecchi
description: Rich Taste of Ecchi is an addicting game in which you have to solve puzzles with Lovely Girls.The game is perfect for relaxing.

name: Haunted Mansion
description: You are in search of a thrill. You are going to do some urbex, camera in hand, in a mansion with the reputation of being haunted. But the horror will fall on you. The terror of the place will have reason of your mental health

name: Sokolor
description: Sokolor is a sokoban game with innovative mechanics. Push the colored cubes into their correct positions, but first you need to paint yourself the same color to be able to push them!

name: Life on the Edge
description: Life on the Edge is an educational tower defense game. You play as a cell struggling to survive waves of bacteria and the COVID-19 virus. Protect your cell and build an understanding of cell biology at the same time!

name: Smithworks
description: Smithworks is a first-person 3D cooperative multiplayer game where players play as fledgling blacksmiths. It is a humorous and chaotic experience where players will need to communicate effectively in order to craft these weapons quickly before the customers get angry.

name: Hen, Chicks and Cats
description: Save all the chicks, but choose your moves carefully or they might fall into the wrong paws.

name: Doodle Devil: 3volution - Puzzles & Quests
description: Continue exploring the dark side with new elements and reactions! - Invade Hell in the "Let there be light in Hell" quest - Create witch in the "Wicked Witch" puzzle - Celebrate Halloween in the "Pumpkin Chaos" puzzle

name: Lost Alone: Ep.3 - Granny
description: Responsible for the deaths of his girlfriend and sister, George is an alcoholic with a stormy past. Raised by a serial killer, George's life ends in suicide. But his story starts right from the end...

name: Trash Horror Collection
description: Welcome to a true 80's trash horror experience. This collection has 8 short horror games that you can freely choose which one you want to play.

name: Nine Lives or Less
description: Nine Lives or Less is a rogue-like action game about a cat going on an adventure with a special jetpack.

name: Furry Cyberfucker II
description: Furry Cyberfucker II is a continuation of our cyberpunk-themed CCG game Furry Cyberfucker with even more hot animated sex scenes

name: Dogs Cyberpuzzle
description: A jigsaw puzzle with videos of dogs in a cyberpunk atmosphere. Beat the clock and find out what Kitty's message is.

name: Charmareians
description: Planet Charmara's situation grows more dire every passing day. Will the Misfits be able to stop the world from falling apart underneath them?

name: Chess Pills
description: You have to guess the right move, but you're running out of time. Use the orange pill to get sharp and focus on the right piece. Or use the turquoise pill to chill and slow the time. But beware, the abuse of substances can cause hallucinations, or worse, leave you in a coma or permanently insane.

name: Tales of Fire
description: Tales of Fire is a short story-driven game, embark on an adventure to bring fire to your ant village or else they all die to the cold winter breeze. Platform your way through mushrooms, escape from evil spiders and make friends along the way. Can you save them?

name: Cooking Mama: Cuisine!
description:
Chop, bake, stew, and more.

The latest Cooking Mama title is available in Apple Arcade!

Choose ingredients and cooking tools, then find a dish!
In Cooking Mama: Cuisine!, find recipes by choosing ingredients and cooking tools.
Start cooking when you've found a combination that works!
Try to find different combinations to see what dishes you can make.

name: Bocce Time! VR
description: It's time to head to the park for some VR bocce action! Bocce Time's various courts will have you throwing, bowling and spinning to win in online matches of up to 4 friends or single player against AI. Closest to the pallino wins, folks! It's Bocce Time!

name: The Devil's Chosen
description: Demons fled from hell and civilization fell. Now it's up to you to gather survivors, scavenge for resources and build a community in a post-apocalyptic world on cards - a world where you define what it means to survive.

name: Masks of Deception
description: Masks of Deception is a 6 player multiplayer game where you must work together to find and expel a demon. However, correctly identifying the monster will be difficult as one of you has been possessed and turned against the rest. Use your senses and investigative tools to gather the information required to send this hellish creature back to the depths from whence it came, all while avoiding the fatal wretched beings that stalk these haunted lands. Note that one chance is all you get, and any mistake can lead to utter failure.

name: Your Computer Might Be at Risk
description: Your Computer Might Be At Risk is a first-person narrative puzzle game. Locked up in a room after a mysterious car accident, you must figure out how to escape while surviving dangerous trials.

name: Pain
description: Climb. Fall. Climb even higher. The pain from failing will be meaningless once the top is reached.

name: Plunder Dungeons
description: Test your mettle in Plunder Dungeons, a card-collecting, monster-bashing Adventure! Will you conquer the Plunder Dungeons?

name: Soul
description: This is a brain-burning puzzle game, with well-designed puzzles everywhere, find clues, analyze the hidden meanings in the clues, solve the puzzles, and finally unlock the secrets of the whole world. Let your brain turn at a high speed, ding, and enjoy the thrill of solving the puzzle!

name: White Night: Deluxe Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Final Vendetta: Super Limited Edition
description:
Final Vendetta is a hard-hitting action packed beat ‘em up for 1 or 2 players in the vein of classic arcade titles. Featuring stunning pixel art and a thumping soundtrack with exclusive tracks from Utah Saints! Brawl with bad dudes and tough girls as you fight through dangerous environments.

The Super Limited Edition of Final Vendetta includes:
- Box contents
- Game: Final Vendetta
- Deck of 32 Collectible Character Cards
- Original Soundtrack
- A4 landscape Artbook
- A3 Poster
- Barrel USB
- A radical “Bin Chicken” sticker!

name: The Oracle Land
description: "The Oracle Land" is a 3D fantasy MMOARPG, set in the magnificent story, enjoy a journey of mission in the western fantasy world.

name: The Slime
description: Enjoy various 2D platform puzzles!

name: Zombie Night Terror: Deluxe Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: I Am 1
description: You start as 1 single pixel, But that's no fun! As you progress, the game evolves into a 2D side-scrolling action adventure! FIGHT through your foes, level up and upgrade to become more than just 1!

name: Final Vendetta: Collector's Edition
description:
Final Vendetta is a hard-hitting action packed beat ‘em up for 1 or 2 players in the vein of classic arcade titles. Featuring stunning pixel art and a thumping soundtrack with exclusive tracks from Utah Saints! Brawl with bad dudes and tough girls as you fight through dangerous environments.

Collector's Edition includes:
- Deck of 32 Collectible Character Cards complete with bio and stats to compete
-The Original Soundtrack featuring the music of Utah Saints and Featurecast
- A radical "Bin Chicken" sticker!

name: Final Vendetta
description: Final Vendetta is a hard-hitting action packed beat ‘em up for 1 or 2 players in the vein of classic arcade titles. Featuring stunning pixel art and a thumping soundtrack with exclusive tracks from Utah Saints! Brawl with bad dudes and tough girls as you fight through dangerous environments.

name: Operation8 Project
description: Short summary: Operation8 Project is a skill-based timing game,

name: Oxide: Room 104
description:
A bone-chilling body-horror game with escape room gameplay. Bad decisions have brought Matthew to this terrifying motel. Now it’s up to you to decide how to escape – will you make it out alive?

Combining escape room gameplay and action, Oxide Room 104 is a bone-chilling single-player body-horror game set inside an old motel. Abducted, at the mercy of a ruthless scientist, and stalked by a horrible creature, you must try to escape using common sense, just as you would in real life. Can you get out of Oxide?

name: Superfly
description: Superfly is a virtual reality action game where you play as the superhero of your dreams. Mix and match eight unique movement modes to fly through a massive open-world city full of challenges for your movement and combat skills.

name: 谜语女孩
description: Sin descripción

name: Rush Out of the Room
description: This is a casual puzzle game. Games are pixelated. You need to pave the way by placing items on the left side and avoiding obstacles to reach your final destination. Please use your talents to overcome the obstacles.

name: Reptrails
description: Singleplayer 2D RTS Chemtrail / NWO Simulation

name: Lux Ex: Legacy
description: Destroy bugs and glitches in your astral body to recover data from the source of the light of your soul.

name: Born Punk
description: A former combat hacker, a corporate CEO and a gangsta-rapping android get possessed by mysterious, otherworldly entities and must band together to save themselves and uncover the entities' origins. Talk, puzzle and explore your way through this (often humorous) cyberpunk thriller.

name: Deep 8
description: Deep 8 is an indie game, mostly inspired by 90s classical RPGs like Final Fantasy. Explore vast worlds, a deep and thrilling story with mildly erotic themes and a Skillbased Roundbased Fighting system.

name: Tsuki ni Yorisou Otome no Sahou
description: Sin descripción

name: Akira GBC
description: A Remake of Akira (Famicom) exclusively for Gameboy Color featuring some new content. Hours of heart pumping visual novel action! Play online or download for free.

name: Five Nights at Freddy's Cleanup Crew: Employee Assessment Teaser
description: Hide from animatronics and sneak your way through environments on the exciting Story Mode, discovering the deepest and darkest secrets that lurk within a mysterious partner to Fazbear Entertainment.

name: Super Mario Land: Timelines
description: Sin descripción

name: Amazing Frog? 2
description: Amazing Frog? 2 is the next generation of Amazing Frog? A Hardcore Parkour, open world buffet of bonkers physics sandbox ...ness.

name: Calmed by the Dark RE:iterate
description: Across the city, people are being mysteriously kidnapped and they are never seen again. Eve, the protagonist, was just looking for a job and somehow ended up discovering a strange world where she awakens her powers and learns the truth behind the kidnappings...

name: Super Super Fun World
description: Super Super Fun World is a small but weird 15 minute indie exploration game.

name: Ten Thousand Days in the Fire
description: Medium-sized runic-themed map, built for Copper

name: Xerxesia
description:
This is a 32-level PWAD compilation of maps I designed for various solo and community projects across five years up to 2021, with the addition of minor tweaks to all maps and a new level to be played in a built-in demo and nothing more.

Similar to Antaresian Reliquary, this WAD features a new weapon and a whole smorgasbord of monsters and props via Extended DeHackEd.

name: Capybara Quest
description: A simple platformer about a Capybara who goes on a quest to rescue their baby.

name: Tomb Raider II: The Forbidden Place
description:
This is a game made with Tomb Raider Level Editor. It uses the mechanics of Tomb Raider 2 while recreating its entire story.

This TRLE was placed in the trle.net hall of fame in 2023.

name: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles: Shredder's Revenge - Special Edition
description:
This version includes:

- A standard edition copy of the game.
- One randomly selected Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles eye mask
- CD Soundtrack featuring 28 tracks presented in a pizza box styled case
- 4x 30mm Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles metal pins
- Metal Shredder keyring
- Numbered autograph art card
- 80mm sewer manhole cover metal coaster

name: Baldo: The Three Fairies
description: During a visit to his aunt in Forra, a while before his main adventure in Guardian Owls, Baldo finds himself in a quest to rescue three fairies and, with their help, stop a terrible evil that lurks in the shadows.

name: For Honor: Season 22 - Curse of the Scarab
description: Includes Testing Grounds, Justice of Pharaohs (Seasonal Event), Bolthorn's Curse Raider Skin, New Seasonal Customization and a new Battle Pass.

name: Grimnight Heroes: Survivors
description:
Roguelike Fantasy survivors game with 16-bit graphics and music.

Multiple Heroes to choose from, and multiple stages to finish. Tons of skills, attributes, and magical books to help along the way.

name: Machines Have Lucid Dreams
description: A photographic point & click about finding balance through small things.

name: Neo Monstrum: Origins
description: Neo Monstrum - Origins is a fully voiced, interactive mystery visual novel that steps into the origins of our main character, Neo.

name: Touhou Spell Bubble: Touhou Seirensen Arrangements Pack
description: This pack consists only of "Touhou Seirensen" arranged music!

name: The Sinking City: Whisper of Darkness Pass
description: A conceptual three-volume DLC pack (Worshippers of the Necronomicon. Merciful Madness, and Investigator Pack) will walk you through amazing and chilling Lovecraftian stories and will get you to the edge of sanity and hidden corners of the human soul.

name: Century: Age of Ashes - Scorched Edition
description: The ashen lands of Svardjäll bear the marks of a violent draconic warfare and years of violent volcanic eruptions. Those who survived these horrific events are now known as the Scorched.

name: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles: Shredder's Revenge - Limited Edition
description:
This edition includes the following:

- Game: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles: Shredder's Revenge
- Reversible Cover
- Sticker Sheet
- Art Booklet
- Limited Edition Outbox
- Keyring
- OST USB

name: Basket Catch
description: Pick up and collect falling objects! More than 100 stages!

name: Redout 2: Deluxe Edition
description: The Deluxe Edition of Redout 2 includes the base game and the Redout 2: Season Pass. The Redout 2: Season Pass includes 2 future DLC packs with new locations, career events, rewards and more, all at a discounted rate.

name: Redout 2: Ultimate Edition
description: The Ultimate Edition of Redout 2 includes the base game, the Redout 2: Season Pass, and a digital download of the Redout 2 Soundtrack. Season Pass includes 2 future DLC packs with new locations, career events, rewards and more, all at a discounted rate.

name: The Sims 4: Werewolves
description: Howl the night away in The Sims 4 Werewolves Game Pack. Your Sims will transform, join packs, and run wild under the light of the full moon. Explore the world of Moonwood Mill and discover the secrets of the werewolves as you navigate your new lycanthrope life. Sims will unlock new skills, manage new temperaments, and maybe even meet their fated mates.

name: Haunted Zombie School
description: It's a single-play TPS game with a movie-like story that the main characters escape from the zombie world. Escape from the zombies and survive with a variety of modes and of a number of weapons that are leveled up and released!

name: I Love Finding More Cats!: Collector's Edition
description: Visit new locations, solve tricky puzzles, and play exciting mini-games! With new cute cats to find, I love finding more cats features even more classic hidden object gameplay across a wide variety of scenes with even more great mini-games to enjoy.

name: Arcade Archives: Space Seeker
description: "SPACE SEEKER" is a hybrid strategy and shooting game released by TAITO in 1981. The game has you battling for victory against ever-approaching waves of enemy air forces in first-person 3D, and mobile fortresses in side-scrolling 2D. Use the map to track…

name: Train Simulator: Salzburg - Schwarzach-St. Veit Route Add-On
description: Visit Austria and drive through stunning scenery with RSSLO’s next instalment for Train Simulator; the Salzburg - Schwarzach-St. Veit route!

name: Mofumofu Sensen
description: Mofumofu Sensen is a fighting game by Burnsoucou that was notably developed using the 3DS/Switch SmileBASIC software before being granted a standalone commercial release.

name: Lump Jump
description: Sin descripción

name: Core: Licht
description: Core: Licht is a hardcore war game. The highly fresh two-dimensional strategy gameplay will bring a unique combat experience. This is a difficult strategy attack and defense game. In every battle, the commander needs to consider card matching, skill timing, career selection... You can also use terrain, resources, special settings, etc. to win by surprise! Use your wisdom to generate different styles of play and enjoy the top victory of strategizing.

name: Lines Universe
description: 500 beautiful & relaxing Numberlink puzzles.

name: Escape Memoirs: Mansion Heist
description: "Escape Memoirs: Mansion Heist" is a co-operative atmospheric reverse escape-room puzzle game. You are a master thief who has been hired to rob a mysterious mansion, filled with various puzzles. Do you think you have what it takes to conquer the challenges that await you in the mansion.

name: Pixel Samurai
description: A journey of a lost samurai. Encounter five samurai and challenge them to a dual. Unleash your katana strike and deflect incoming attacks. Fight for honor or die with shame.

name: Hot Milf 6
description: Hentai is not just 2D girls, this is a whole art.

name: Music Man
description: Collect all music notes in 2 different big worlds to finish maps. Beware dangerous enemies and use platforms to move forward.

name: Bounty
description: Bounty is a fast-paced and brutal top-down action RPG set in a post-apocalyptic world populated by humanoid blobs. As a scavenger, it's your job to sift through the wreckage of this strange dystopia. What will you find?

name: Weeping Falls Massacre
description: 80's horror inspired FPS, a nightmarish scene taking place at an abandoned orphanage.

name: Heart Lake
description: Heart Lake is a first-person pixel-style game. Different personalities have different and distinct personalities. Players experience different journeys in the process of getting along with different personalities, and finally help the protagonist grow up.

name: Space Maxwell: Arcade
description: Shoot your enemies and try not to let them multiply themselves and turn the game into a chaotic space battle! Space Maxwell is an arcade shooter where your spaceship has the ability to destroy or to multiply your enemies. Climb the leaderboard and try to survive as long as you can!

name: Hatup
description: In Hatup you'll have the mission to go through different challenges with your hat that will allow you to progress through the game's stages. Using different mechanics you will face many challenges and with different levels of difficulty.

name: Highway Driving
description: Highway Driving is 3D racing game for everyone. Players will be amazed with the overall gaming experience in this game. There are various different tracks and game modes in the game. Players can select many different types of vehicles.

name: Brain Vomits Garden
description: Connect with friends or strangers to explore the vast realm of Brain Vomit. Paint, discover secrets, minigames, sidequests, and drippy apparel in a beautiful, massively multiplayer world.

name: The Butcher
description: Fighting your way through hellish enemies to seek vengeance in this dark-fantasy action game.

name: Surviving the Aftermath: New Alliances
description: With Surviving the Aftermath: New Alliances, your actions now go beyond the confines of your settlement and can influence other societies in the Wasteland. New Alliances expands the World Map where beasts and bandits will react to your choices and can even take over strategic locations. Interacting with societies has become more impactful, allowing players to unite colonies under their banner. Uniting colonies requires players to maintain their reputation or risk creating more rivals to compete against. Specialists can go on covert missions and influence the world through sabotage, theft, espionage, and propaganda, but be mindful of the risks as failure will have devastating consequences.

name: Home Solo Car Racer
description: It's a small toy car home racing game with 39 indoor levels. You are alone in the game. it's a single player game. But with the option to save multiple user profiles.

name: Bathotel
description: Step into the everchanging, claustrophobic world of Batho[tel]. After losing everything, including your own body, you find yourself walking through a hotel which seems familiar but eerily unwelcoming. Solve puzzles, avoid death, and learn about other guests as you explore the repeating world.

name: Flatout Pixel Racing
description: Go flatout! No brakes needed! A retro arcade top down racing game in a pixel art style.

name: Deadcraft: Jessie's Wasteland Wares
description: Gather materials and craft items to sell at your shop in order to raise funds for Jessie’s beloved Miss Duna. Fend off thieves and picky customers alike to strike it rich! Features new missions and an original story featuring Jessie as the protagonist.

name: White Lavender
description: White Lavender is a challenging adventure game with RPG-elements. Journey through a colorful miniature world, collect cool items like pencils and party hats, grow strong, meet magic frogs and beetles, and battle mean critters on your journey to brew a special tea to save your sister!

name: Niflhel's Fables: The Book of Gypsies
description: A visual novel with a fabulous atmosphere where your every choice matters.

name: Crazy Chicken Xtreme
description: The craziest shooter classic in a new ingenious version! Moorhuhn / Crazy Chicken is one of the best-known and most successful game characters. Join the large Moorhuhn community now!

name: Mothergunship: Forge
description: Craft. Shoot. Die. Repeat. Forge absurdly powerful guns and fight through the belly of a metal alien monstrosity in this VR FPS roguelite follow up to Mothergunship. Wanna build a rocket-firing-shotgun or a toxic spike-ball-launcher? Unleash your inner mad scientist, then take on the Mothergunship.

name: Fruit Basket TV
description: Fruit Basket is the world's premier lethal obstacle course gameshow. Contestants run, jump, and dodge their way to a shot at one million credits, while the timer on their lives ticks down. Join the competition, shoot for the best times, and unlock the most fashionable of hats in order to stay alive.

name: Telestians
description: Telestians is a turn-based strategy war game that takes place in a dark fantasy setting. Build armies, search ruins, conquer enemies, and hear the lamentations of their women!

name: Thomas' Tales
description: Launch into an adventure with the charismatic and fearless cat Thomas on a dangerous quest to save his brothers in a magical and unknown world.

name: Horgihugh and Friends
description: Shoot down 16-bit bad guys in Horgihugh and Friends! At the end of a brutal war, countries decided to dismantle their weapons. When the Gozareans attack, two retired pilots realize their trusty vintage fighter planes are the only means of combating the a…

name: Neko Secret Room
description: Sneak into your photographer friend's room and find out what she’s hiding! Neko Secret Room is a naughty action puzzler where you have to solve the grid-based brain teasers of ChanOS to hack into a database of saucy photos. Select pieces of each image and swap them around to discover the correct combination and restore the completed scene. The lovely clients shown within are surely worth the effort!

name: Disgaea 6 Complete
description: Can a mere Netherworld zombie rise up and destroy a god? Find out in the newest installment of the Disgaea series! Features such as Super Reincarnation, 3D visuals, and adjustable gameplay settings make this the perfect game for both new and old Disgaea fans!

name: Eat Colors
description: Eat Colors is a precision platform game, where instead of running and jumping you throw yourself from surface to surface using just the mouse and a fluffy slime that sticks anywhere.

name: Redout 2
description: The fastest racing game in the universe. Redout 2 is a tribute to classic arcade racing games and the sequel to the critically acclaimed Redout. Reach impossible speeds in exhilarating futuristic races across an extensive single-player campaign and competitive multiplayer.

name: Overlord: Escape from Nazarick
description:
The rich world of Overlord is yours to explore in this robust, story-driven Metroidvania.
Play as fan-favorite Clementine and delve into an entirely new chapter in the Overlord series, brought to life under the supervision of the original creator, Kugane Maruyama.
Whether you’re new to the series or a diehard fan, there will be plenty for you to discover and enjoy in this dark fantasy action-adventure that ensnares you in a web of intrigue in typical Overlord fashion.

name: OmegaBot
description: A tight action side-scroller with challenging robotic bosses. Dodge metallic dangers, acquire powerful weapons and blast your way through a destroyed world full of deadly machines where running out of energy means defeat.

name: Nightmare Frames
description: Nightmare Frames is a supernatural thriller where you'll step into the shoes of Alan Goldberg, in the search for the scariest horror film of all time. An enthralling journey through the streets of the Hollywood of the 80s, a small haunted town, and even Hell itself.

name: Swarm the City
description:
Swarm the City is a casual strategy game where players use zombies to attack and infect humans.

In the game, you are Karr the Great, a dark lord of zombies. You must find the weaknesses in the human cities and then destroy them. Evolve your zombie army. Choose the best strategy and infiltrate the cities until they are under your rule!

name: Frozenheim
description: Frozenheim is a serene Norse city builder with elaborate management gameplay and RTS tactical combat. Lead your Viking clan through hardships of the frozen north, season by season, year after year. Build and survive. Set sail, explore and conquer. Win Odin’s favor and secure your place in Valhalla!

name: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles: Shredder's Revenge
description: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles: Shredder's Revenge is a side-scrolling beat 'em up developed by Tribute Games and published by DotEmu. Inspired by the 1987 Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles animated series, the game pays homage to classic TMNT titles like Turtles in Time, featuring retro-inspired pixel art and dynamic combat. Players control Leonardo, Michelangelo, Donatello, Raphael, or other allies, each with unique abilities, as they battle through various levels to thwart Shredder and Krang's plans to conquer New York City. The game supports solo play or co-op for up to six players, blending nostalgic design with modern gameplay mechanics.

name: Neon White
description: Neon White is a lightning fast first-person action game about exterminating demons in Heaven. You are White, an assassin handpicked from Hell to compete with other demon slayers for a chance to live permanently in Heaven. The other assassins seem familiar, though… did you know them in a past life?

name: Starship Troopers: Terran Command
description: Starship Troopers: Terran Command is a thrilling real-time strategy game set in the Starship Troopers movies universe. Take command of the Mobile Infantry and do your part in the war against the Arachnid threat. Ensure that human civilization, not insect, dominates the galaxy now and always!

name: Skeleton Crew
description: Launch your enemies like Gothic pinballs in Skeleton Crew, the physics-based platform brawler. A band of misfit heroes is all that stands between the last survivors of humanity and the legions of Chaos that have assembled to destroy them.

name: Dungeons of Edera
description: Dungeons of Edera is a rogue-lite action RPG dungeon crawler featuring procedurally generated levels where you will battle through hordes of monsters to restore Edera to its former glory.

name: Hero Emblems II
description:
A mobile RPG adventure game that uses a match-3 system for battles.

The game was shown at Tokyo Game Show 2016 with a planned release in 2017 but has been delayed since with few development updates given on its progress, the last being in January 2019.
It is being developed by a 2 person indie team in Taiwan.

name: Counter-Strike: Source Offensive
description:
Ever wanted to play CS:S just like CS:GO but tired of simple model-changing mods? Then this mod is for you! This is a mod for Counter-Strike: Source, which brings a lot of gameplay features from CS:GO into CS:S, such as:

All weapons from CS:GO (really, all of them!)
All player factions from CS:GO
Panorama-like HUD
Even all agents from CS:GO! (you can switch them in-game whenever you want)
Loadout system (for example, you can use either P2000 or USP-S, depending on what you prefer!)
Gloves that you can also change in-game!
Complete CS:GO shooting mechanics (spray patterns, etc)
New gamemodes: Deathmatch (normal and FFA), Arms Race, Flying Scoutsman, Wingman
CS:GO shaders: Character, WeaponDecal, CustomWeapon and improved phong shading for VertexLitGeneric
CS:GO postprocessing
VScripts
Molotov & Decoy grenades
Playing as bots when dead
CS:GO player animations (v0.10 and above: from the current CS:GO build; below v0.10: from an old CS:GO build)
Ironsights
New cash award system (award for defusing/planting the bomb, different kill rewards for different weapons)
All CS:GO radio commands
CS:GO viewbob
Weapon inspection
New sounds from CS:GO (footsteps, hit sounds, etc)
Unique hands viewmodel for each faction
Unique voice for each faction (bots included)
Carrying hostages just like in CS:GO
Different grenade throw ranges
CS:GO C4 logic (radio message 4 seconds before explosion; it will explode 1 second after going off just like in CS:GO)
Unique voice lines for each grenade throw
English and Russian translations

name: Bartolomeu Odyssey
description: Bartolomeu Odyssey is a side scroller based on the tellings of the flying priest, Bartolomeu de Gusmão, in which you need to dodge the birds, vultures, and other dangers that dominate the skies of this reality.

name: Grand Theft Auto V
description: This bundle contains the original version of Grand Theft Auto V, the standalone game Grand Theft Auto Online and the story mode add-on of Grand Theft Auto V.

name: War Thunder: Leopard 2A4 Pack
Poop KIller III
description:
"Poop Killer 3" is the poop killer kill sequel. Increasingly bizarre with an acid comedy typical of 80's and 90's horror/comedy movies.

A game where we mix tension and extremely exaggerated comedy, bullshit in the form of a game. Contains 4 possible endings. Two of them might be good.

Robert owns a nightclub, the year is 1985. After a customer shits and doesn't flush... the Poop Killer will show up to bring you a big piece of shit.

name: Boobs vs Aliens
description: Discover your real divine heritage in our funtastic Tower Defense game! Join the fast-paced, action-packed, cosmically entertaining world of Boobs vs. Aliens and see your powers grow with each battle! Dig deep inside the human psyche, and learn about the very essence of libido as you take part in unforgettable and kinky sexual adventures filled with legendary tales of heroism, tantra, neuroscience, occult, virtual reality and out of this world hi-tech weaponry! So what are you waiting for? Give a fuck! Save the world!

name: Shift
description: Shift is a deceptively simple match-four game for Playdate that requires a little strategy, a small amount of luck and occasionally a deep breath and a fingers-crossed gamble.

name: Apex Legends Mobile: Cold Snap
description: Brace yourself, Legends: a Cold Snap is coming to Apex Legends Mobile! Welcome Loba to the Legends and see how the Games are evolving in Apex Legends Mobile: Cold Snap.

name: Banana Kong 2
description:
Banana Kong 2 builds up on the original endless runner concept and adds entirely new challenges and ideas! Solve all-new missions, collect bananas and win golden Kong Coins to buy upgrades, hats and many other items in the crazy jungle shop! Become the King of the Jungle! While you dash through the jungle you'll be able to compete with your friends! Who will run the best distance? You can see your friends best results right in the game. Compare your records and unlock achievements while improving your playing style.

A highly dynamic game engine will provide endless fun in this never-ending run. Each session is a new challenge as the level is built randomly on the fly. Collect as many bananas as possible to fill your energy bar. Use a power-dash to destroy obstacles. Find secrets and unlock extras to get the most out of the game.

name: Outbreak: Silver Collection
description: Experience three survival horror adventures in the Outbreak Silver Collection!

name: OlliOlli World: Void Riders
description: The Void Riders have landed in OlliOlli World's first DLC! Void Riders brings a brave new world of challenge and space-age gear as you prepare to enter an alien biome: the V.O.I.D.

name: Rocket League: Season 7
description: Welcome, esteemed Rocketeers! Season 7 features luxurious rewards like the Maestro Car and golden painted pro tier items. Rank up in the Utopia Coliseum (Gilded) Arena, or compete for tournament rewards.

name: Furry Cybersex
description: Furry Cybersex is a unique adult game which combines interesting logic puzzle with exiting animations of furry girls that you earn after successfully passed levels!

name: Sex Search 2: Ultimate
description: Plunge into the world of relaxation and light erotica! Mindfulness logic game with many modes.

name: Nightmare Slash
description: "Nightmare Slash" is a 2D slasher with a side view. The player uses mouse to cut his enemies, to dodge and run from flying creatures, wait for the moment to kill dark enemies who gets in his way.

name: Later Daters: Premium
description: You're the newest resident at Ye OLDE retirement community, where you'll meet a cast of sexy seniors who are all dying (not literally) to meet you. It's a lot like summer camp, but with orthopedic shoes, bridge clubs, and more jell-o.

name: Pirates Things
description: Pirates Things is a 3D find and click puzzle game in which you have to find some items on the tropic town location within a certain time.

name: Madman Catcher
description: "Madman Catcher" is a classic 2D platform game. The main goal is to get pills of the right color from scattered first-aid kits. Just beware of the mentally ill patients, they are not very happy with your work (that`s why they ran away and do not want to return).

name: Neon Invaders
description: Neon Invaders will take you back to your gaming roots with its constant action and relentlessly brutal enemies. Absorb enemy shots of the same colour to trigger a flurry of fire to decimate the alien invaders. Dodge and Match your way to victory through 40 levels and 5 difficulty settings.

name: Desert Things
description: Desert Things is a 3D find and click puzzle game in which you have to find some items on the desert location within a certain time.

name: Alien Shooter 2: New Era
description: A desert, an abandoned city, cramped underground corridors of MAGMAs research centers, and for hundreds of kilometers around there is only darkness and thousands of monsters coming from all sides. You have only two options - to achieve your goal or die.

name: Armed Zone
description: Armed Zone is an intensive Third Person Cover Shooter game blended with team tactics and diverse gameplays. Experience the furious combat on ever-changing modern battlefields, you can play both Singleplayer and Multiplayer modes.

name: Wonderful Waking World
description: A simplistic, dynamic Touhou fangame bullet hell shmup with a pixel art esthetic. Shoot down your enemies and dodge your way through an incessant barrage of projectiles!

name: Ye Olde Cribbage Club: A Later Daters Game
description: Cozy up with your favorite Ye Olde residents with a cracking cribbage contest. What is cribbage? Only the best board and card game combo ever played, enjoyed by many a senior citizen and old soul.

name: Morlush
description: The daily life of a Reaper apprentice in Morlush. You have to go to different parts of the magical island, to fulfill the reaper's order, on your way you will encounter various dangers and monsters.

name: EpicRecovery
description: A shooter game with endless fun of turning back and forth. The game system is simple, with a short stage lasting less than one minute, in which you aim for a high score until you run out of remaining airplanes.

name: Neodori Forever
description: Neodori Forever is a retro inspired, endless arcade 3D racing game inspired by the beloved old classics. A colorful cast of rivals is waiting to race against you on a variety of vibrant environments. Collect power ups and coins on the way to expand your car collection and outrun the competition.

name: Rue La Résistance
description: Rue | la résistance is the third project of the RVT studio, which tells about the life of a group of partisans operating in the territory of occupied France. The game is based on the principle of a theatrical production: it is based on the play "Ghost Sonata" by August Strindberg

name: Penitence
description: Return home and uncover the mystery of your daughter's death, and the demon that plagues you, in this escape room style atmospheric puzzler.

name: It's Time
description: Play as a young scientist who invents a time portal and uses it to bring back his dead wife. Soon, things become chaotic in his life. Make choices and help people as you progress. Decide whom to save, your family or friends. Your choices determine the ending.

name: Dice Tribes: Ambitions
description: A dice-based worker placement game. Manage the randomness and complete your ambition to win.

name: Super Ember Kaboom
description: Super Ember Kaboom is a fast-paced, cute-and-colorful action game. It has tight controls and simple to learn, difficult to master gameplay that makes each level a joy to run through.

name: 100 Doors: Escape from Prison
description: This escape logic puzzle game takes you to Beren, a young journalist, who gets trapped inside an old prison and needs all the help she can get to solve brain-teasing logic puzzles. No one finds the prison pleasant, so put yourself in her shoes and help her open all the doors till she's rescued.

name: King Rabbit: Race
description:
Hop quickly through deadly obstacle courses and get further than the other rabbits to win! Catchy gameplay and competitive leaderboards will have you playing just one more round. Earn trophies to rank up and face more challenging opponents! Are you skilled enough to place in the top 10 of the daily challenge? A new daily challenge level is generated daily. You'll be exercising your precision, speed, coordination, and memory. Use the arrow keys or WASD to move and hop your way to victory. Invite & follow your friends to race with them!

Includes an in-game marketplace is where you can buy and sell rabbit skins and rings! Rabbit skins are limited to only 100 of each design. With tons of rabbits and new ones being added, you're sure to find something your style. Decorate your rabbits with rings for unique spawn and death sound effects and particles. Complete quests for soft currency and encounter rare items on encounter islands.

name: Dreamworld
description: DREAMWORLD is a puzzle platform game. The player must overcome obstacles to advance and reach his goal: the heart of the tornado. In the levels of the wanderers, it will be necessary to solve puzzles by assembling items and placing them in the right place.

name: Camp Palut
description: Camp Palut is a spooky-cute sapphic visual novel with magic, mystery, and a glimpse of the supernatural. Featuring four different love interests with multiple endings, and separate but interlocking stories that lead to a thrilling conclusion.

name: American Theft 80s
description: It's the 80s. Steal vhs players, tapes, classic cars, and if you get caught, outrun the police!

name: Isles of Cubes
description: Strategy Puzzle Game. Explore and colonize islands. Establish production chains. But your resources and space are limited. You must plan carefully.

name: DnD Adventure: Wizard's Choice
description: RPG interactive novels that will engross you in a story while allowing you to make the decisions that will determine your fate.

name: Nemesis: Distress
description: Nemesis: Distress, a multiplayer game with a hidden traitor mechanic, as well as shooter and survival elements, puts you on a ship lost in space, where evolving Intruders rampage down corridors and rip through everything that stands in their way. Will you save the ship? Will you stay loyal to your crew? Or will you take the easy way out and board an escape pod at any cost? The possibilities are almost limitless, as each game of Nemesis: Distress will create its own cinematic sci-fi horror experience. Players will progress through 40-minute scenarios, trying to survive while fulfilling their secret objective.

name: VoidGate
description: VoidGate is a third-person Diablo style dungeon crawling game. It consists of randomly generated dungeons, lite survival elements, and permanent death. The combat consists of strategic real-time action, using different styles of melee combat, ranged combat, and magic. There is no class system, as it allows absolute freedom of the player to choose their attributes, stats, and skills. However, there are some class archetypes for players who may want to choose a narrower suggested path.

name: Speleomorph
description:
Go spelunking, discover new shapes, and return to the surface transformed!

Speleomorph is a nonlinear puzzle game made for Metroidvania Month 16, inspired by the Shapeshifting theme.

name: Tom Clancy's Rainbow Six Siege: Operation Vector Glare
description: Divert enemy attention and gain the upper hand with Sens, the new Operator from the Belgian Special Forces Group. Sens comes equipped with the brand-new POF9 assault rifle and the R.O.U. Projector System ability, allowing them to break line of sight and turn the tide of battle. Operation Vector Glare also introduces the Shooting Range and a new Team Deathmatch map set in Greece, offering fresh venues to hone your skills and put them to the test.

name: Capybara Rush
description:
Be the famous viral capybara and Pull Up!
Capybara Rush is an exciting endless running game.
Take your capybara through an amazing running adventure.
Collect capybaras as you run and reach the finish line with as many as possible.
Collect the coins and unlock your favorite capybara.
Run in all sorts of different environments full of color and joy.
How far can your capybara run?

name: Holotyping
description:
Holotyping is a Hololive fan-made typing game.
Can use support and ultimate to get a high score!

name: Jurassic World Evolution 2: Dominion Biosyn Bundle
description: Experience a world evolved with Jurassic World Evolution 2: Dominion Biosyn Bundle. It contains the critically acclaimed base game alongside its biggest DLC yet in Jurassic World Evolution 2: Dominion Biosyn Expansion, and dinosaur-rich Deluxe Upgrade Pack.

name: Relics of the Past
description: Relics of the Past is a Story based 2D Metroidvania based in a Fantasie world

name: Trainz Railroad Simulator 2019: Potteries Loop Line
description: A prototypical representation of the railway system serving the Staffordshire Potteries and surrounding towns and industries in the 1930s.

name: Trainz Railroad Simulator 2019: CFR B 26-26 098
description: Manufactured at the "VEB Waggonbau Goerlitz" factory in Germany, this versatile doubledecker car was used on regional passenger transport by the Romanian operator CFR and then by CFR Calatori, being repainted into various paintschemes through the years, mainly different types of blue paint.

name: Killing Floor 2: Ultimate Edition
description:
For new players looking for the most comprehensive Killing Floor 2 experience in existence.
Featuring a a lot of content, including:
- Killing Floor 2 Base Game
- Armory Season Pass 1
- Armory Season Pass 2 plus many additional cosmetic items.

name: Snake of Maths! Cool Education Game
description: Slide the snake up or down on the screen to guide it to the correct answer. Break the blocks and get the biggest snake of all. The slithering snake eats the dots to extend its life. Hit the number blocks with the correct answer and show your math skills.

name: Hero Siege: Gates of Valhalla
description: Features Act 8 Expansion and its content

name: Sanrio Characters: Miracle Match
description: Sin descripción

name: Achromatic
description: Achromatic is a first-person horror puzzle game — Walk around the carnival you have been tasked with repairing and uncover the darker secrets that lie within. Solve puzzles and avoid the carnival workers as you try to escape.

name: Logicality
description: Immerse yourself in an exciting journey on the island of dreams. Explore the open world and interesting places, while solving various puzzles that use environment.

name: Jurassic World Evolution 2: Dominion Biosyn Expansion
description: The biggest DLC yet for Jurassic World Evolution 2 features a new campaign inspired by events from Jurassic World Dominion, including all-new prehistoric species, feathered dinosaurs, a new Chaos Theory scenario, and more.

name: Hide and Seek Scramble!
description: Three players. Two teams. One kidnapped bunny! Play as three different characters in this fast-paced, competitive multiplayer game.

name: Raft Life
description: Raft Life - Build, Farm, Protect and Expand Your Perfect Raft!

name: Bike Jump
description: Become a crazy bike stunt driver! How far can you jump?

name: The Katydids Incident
description: There is a big discussion going on about a mysterious group named The Katydids proposing riddles and challenges on online forums, Are you clever enough to unravel the mystery of this obscure organization?

name: Conditus
description: Show your friends who's the strongest ninja, and make them suffer. Or team up with them to eliminate your enemies.

name: Monsterlands
description: Monsterlands is an exciting rogue-like survival game. Fight against the monsters and try to survive by upgrading your weapons and items.

name: Prison Architect: Gangs
description: They are organized and want to take control of your prison. Show them who’s in charge and stop their schemes! With Prison Architect: Gangs you’ll need to carefully manage your inmates, staff, and guard presence to avoid riots and ensure a peaceful - yet profitable - prison.

name: Pleim
description: An open world adventure game. You can move around the city, talk to residents, and investigate cases. The game has an interesting plot that will not leave anyone indifferent.

name: Echo
description:
What if you had a clone who repeats everything you do? And what if you had to destroy it? This is precisely what this game is about.

In echo, the player has a clone, who mirrors your every move. Just like a mirror reflection. Your goal is to figure out how to destroy that clone. You solve puzzles by figuring out how to use the environment and items to correctly sync the player's and clone's movements. Only then can you destroy the clone. You have to be careful though. The wrong move can lead to you destroying yourself instead of the clone.

name: Abedot Family Estate: Search For Hidden Objects
description: A game in the genre of "hidden object", in which you have to explore an old family mansion. Luxurious rooms, a library full of mysterious volumes, a winter garden and a creepy dungeon - explore locations, collect clues and beware of shadows in the corners!

name: Rapture
description: Rapture is a casual game with roguelike elements, gain experience, collect items, level up and try to survive thousands of enemies as long as you can.

name: John Christian 2
description: The game John Christian 2 tells the heroism of a young man in a spiritual battle, who after receiving the armor of God, begins his mission to spread the gospel to every creature. On his journey, John is taken by God to a village and discovers that many people are in need of his help.

name: Dynasty Legends 2
description: Dynasty Legends 2 is a complete evolution of the Hack & Slash ARPG game. Thrilling battle experience allows you to wipe out thousands of enemies all by yourself, and become the overlord of the Three Kingdoms. Stunning graphics, bring you back to chaotic ancient battlefields. Join the battle with your friends now and build up your empire!

name: Shinobi Warfare
description: Play an 2d turn based RPG multiplayer game, stylize your own shinobi and play different game modes alone or with your friends! Level up, unlock various items and skills and procced in your journey of becoming the next Kage!

name: The First Odyssey
description: Face an Odyssey built on violence, horror, puzzles, challenges and human cynicism. Experience a truly atmospheric and realistic survival horror experience in a dystopian future.

name: Hardcore Trivia
description: Challenge your brains and have a fun time with multiple challenging questions! Hardcore trivia offers questions for many needs. With a Commercial licence, you can arrange a new event easily for example in your bar and provide entertainment to the customers.

name: Fire Commander: First Response
description: Lead a team of firefighters against the force of nature! Play the free prologue to Fire Commander, a real time tactical game about the real heroes.

name: Nevermore: The Chamber Door
description: NEVERMORE: The Chamber Door is an indie game developed by just one person, with fluid combat in the style of hack n 'slash and lore inspired by the work of Edgar Allan Poe.

name: Doom: The Classics Collection
description: This includes three classic Doom games preserved on one disc - Doom, Doom II, and Doom 3! No game downloads required.

name: The Hand of Merlin
description: The Hand of Merlin is a turn-based rogue-lite RPG in which Arthurian legend clashes with cosmic horror. Recruit a company of up to three mortal heroes and guide them in spirit on a desperate journey from Albion to Jerusalem. Explore a richly-imagined medieval setting on the brink of apocalypse. Trade with merchants, improve your heroes and unearth ancient relics. Search for the lost fragments of your soul, scattered across the multiverse - and save as many worlds as you can.

name: Lacerta
description: Sin descripción

name: Crash Bash Remake
description: Sin descripción

name: Toy Story 2: Buzz Lightyear to the Rescue!
description:
Experience Disney•Pixar Toy Story 2: Buzz Lightyear to the Rescue! originally released on the PlayStation console, enhanced with up-rendering, rewind, quick save, and custom video filters.

As space hero Buzz, you've got your hands full. Your best buddy, Woody, has been kidnapped by a greedy toy collector and it's going to be an all-out race against time to save him.

It's all up to you. Buzz Lightyear to the rescue!

name: Fortnite: Rogue Alias Pack
description: Sin descripción

name: Infra: Underground
description: INFRA: Underground is a fan-made mod for INFRA that was released on June 13, 2022.

name: Magic & Legend: Time Knights
description:
In Magic and Legend: Time Knights, players will follow the tale of the titular heroes as they travel through time to fight off malevolent invaders.

Both Magic and Legend feature their own unique set of abilities, letting players experiment with the right tactics and get a feel of the playstyle that suits them best. Of course, in case they can't make up their minds (because both are equally fun to use), they can always switch between the two characters at any time on the fly.

The game features 5 large sprawling levels over the time periods:
- Level 1: The Journey Begins... (Present Day)
- Level 2: Medieval Times
- Level 3: Sengoku Period
- Level 4: Ancient Rome
- Level 5: The Crown Jewel Heist (60's London)

For each level Magic and Legend have their own costumes and weapons and just for fun there are also 4 bonus levels.

Lastly, to ensure the world is safe, the boys go up against a final boss who is hell bent on taking on taking out Magic & Legend so they can take the planet for themselves.

name: Hook Up: The Game
description: A 20-something woman on a dating app ends up matching with her high school bully, and bad decisions ensue. The game is played from inside the fictional dating app UI.

name: Hazmob FPS
description:
Online gun shooting game with fast-paced gunfights.Experience the ultimate FPS.

Unleash tactical warfare in intense PvP battles, team up with friends, and dominate the multiplayer arena in our adrenaline-fueled gun shooting game. Get ready for fast-paced action and immerse yourself in the thrill of multiplayer FPS combat.

name: I.Q Intelligent Qube
description:
I.Q Intelligent Qube is a test of intelligence created by a higher power than ourselves. Your objective: destroy huge, deadly cubes as they roll relentlessly towards you and clear a path through the onslaught simply to survive.

Experience I.Q Intelligent Qube originally released on the PlayStation console, enhanced with up-rendering, rewind, quick save, and custom video filters.

name: Mega Man Ultra Challenge
description: Welcome to Mega Man Ultra Challenge, the creator's first ever complete ROM hack! In this boss rush adventure, you will find robot masters with brand new arenas! Sometimes the AI doesn’t have to be changed! This hack modifies levels, colors, and moves up the score.

name: Lifeline: Beside You in Time
description:
After a lengthy radio silence, Taylor returns at last! This brand new adventure finds the hapless astronaut on the other side of a black hole, relying on you alone to help make life-or-death decisions in a playable, branching story of survival in the depths of unknown space.

But this time, there’s a twist: Players can also choose to communicate with T2, Taylor’s time-warped, alien-infected “evil twin,” helping or hindering as they see fit. Throughout the story, seemingly simple decisions can have profound effects. Make choices using your Phone or Watch, and face the consequences alongside the desperate astronauts.

name: Hot Shots Golf
description: The first game in the Hot Shots Golf / Everybody's Golf series, now ported to PlayStation 4 and 5 with trophy support, rewind, and quick save and load features.

name: Shining Jump Jump
description: Yggdra Resonanc (old Shining Maiden)'s cute girl jumping game~!

name: 1001 Jigsaw Detective 2
description: Reveal new difficult cases with 1001 Jigsaw Detective 2. 500 detective puzzles!

name: Mugsy & Mugsy's Revenge
description: As a Chicago mob boss at the start of Prohibition, you must make tough decisions to manage your crime empire. How many hoods to employ? How many clients to squeeze? How much to kick back to the cops? Don't be a schmuck, or you'll find yourself at the wrong end of a Chicago Typewriter.

name: Touhou Fairy Knockout: One Fairy to Rule Them All
description: A game where multiple players co-fight or compete against each other! You will role-play as playful fairies with unique personalities, and accomplish your own Gekokujō in Gensokyo where the strong gather! Make your own favorite fairy character the strongest with your own hands!

If you think you are smart then this is a place where you can challenge the power of your mind. In this game you can use boxes and ladders to climb and find solutions to puzzles by focusing and thinking.

name: The Dead Sea Scrolls Adventure
description: Play as Dr. Jerusalem Jones, an explorer set on finding out the history behind the 7 major Dead Sea Scrolls. Along the way, the player gets to meet a whole cast of characters and traverse across the deserts and caves near the Dead Sea and Bethlehem to learn about the history behind these relics.

name: PvNP
description: A classic Sokoban game but with a modern take. 50 levels to test your brain in a semi-open world.

name: Maniacs
description: Sin descripción

name: AI Under Test
description: The fear of artificial intelligence is nothing new, but will it always be for the bad? Solve puzzles and follow the creator and creator's conversation during the testing phase, until the moment they are interrupted by external matters.

name: King Pig
description: "King Pig" is an old-school top down arcade game. Your main goal is to save pigs from butchers. Be careful, butchers` saws must not hurt the pigs - dodge the saw with your heavy-duty cloak and kill all butchers!

name: Mayor T-Rex
description: Major T-Rex and his gang are back in town. A new apocalypse is coming because the nature can no longer support humans and their constructions.

name: Yummy Girls
description: Sin descripción

name: Farm Defense
description: Farm Defense is a standalone game inspired by the Warcraft 3 mod ‘Random Farm’. Enjoy the nostalgic experience with new features and content. You are pitted against waves of increasingly difficult enemies in a Tower Defense environment. Mitigate the random elements to defend the farm. Conquer all 40 waves to live and fight another day.

name: Final Blockade
description: In this war, you have to play a brave man, go out and defeat zombies and find the cause of the end.

name: Worker Riot
description: A worker who has been left without a salary is a dangerous opponent. Armed with a hammer, he will not leave them alone. Help him defeat them all. Beat out of them everything they owe you for your work

name: Witch Epoch
description: Witch Epoch is a game about a Witch fighting in the otherworld with various monsters that are getting stronger every time, collecting colored bonuses the player can cause damage and if the color of the bonus matches the color of the monster's weakness, then he will receive maximum damage!

name: Animals
description: "Animals" is a game based on the mechanics of "3 in a row". The goal of Match-3 puzzles is to make groups: lines and rows of 3 or more identical tiles.

name: Downpurr
description: A cutesy platformer-shooter about magic, cats, and rain.

name: Inventory Hero
description:
Inventory Hero is a frantically paced role-playing game where you leave the exploration and the monster battles to the computer so you can focus on the true meaning of adventure: managing your inventory.

Drop the trash, equip the good stuff, save the potions for a rainy day, and remember to watch out for rabbits…

name: Spellcorked!
description: In this laid-back magical gig economy crafting game, you are a recently-graduated young witch trying to thrive in a digital age. With a bit of help and a lot of love, fulfill potion orders for people you never meet, and try to get the best reviews you can!

name: Delightful Adventure: Enhanced
description: Sin descripción

name: Mother 2: Perfect Edition
description:
Mother 2: Perfect Edition borrows a handful of stuff from ShadowOne333’s very popular MaternalBound hack, but with great help from Tomato’s Legend of Localization website, this uncensored re-localization brings to you a more smoothed out and refined script than the MaternalBound one, and gets as close as possible to the original Japanese script without sacrificing flow or alienating American players by keeping in references that don’t make sense outside of Japan, as well as many graphical changes to make the game even more in line with its Japanese original.

Leaving personal taste out of the equation, this hack was created with the mindset of a professional editor, and with the hope that anyone, whether you’ve never played before or you’ve played dozens of times, can patch their ROM and feel comfortable knowing that they’re getting a definitive MOTHER 2 experience, just in English.

name: ITGmania
description: ITGmania is a cross-platform rhythm game and engine. Similar to Dance Dance Revolution, it is often played with dance mats or pads.
