Although originally created to simulate the now defunct game, In The Groove, it has since grown to be a completely community driven effort providing regular new content and updates.

name: Sarin
description: In the not-so-distant future. The Middle Eastern Arab country of Ajeeba is under military dictatorship. The government is trying to cover up a corruption scandal and it's up to a little girl to expose that scandal by staying alive.

name: Shin Nobunaga no Yabou
description: A new smartphone app "New Nobunaga's Ambition" made under the official license of "Nobunaga's Ambition / Creation" is now available! Challenge new ambitions with generals from all over the country!

name: New Super Realistic Mario Bros.
description:
New Super Realistic Mario Bros is a kind of creepypasta game but not really?
It starts off normally, like a classic Super Mario Game, but suddenly, it acts weirdly...

name: Runewatch: Age of Arcanum
description: Runewatch is a Single-Player Roguelite First-Person Shooter with Role-Playing Game elements for PC. The player controls an elementalist who makes use of their magic abilities while exploring randomly generated dungeons, defeating enemies, and progressively becoming a master elementalist through exploration, killing, death and repetition.

name: Rock Paper Scissors: Breakthrough Gaming Arcade - Challenge Mode Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Rabbit Knight
description: Slay mushrooms in this action packed platformer!

name: Softball: Breakthrough Gaming Arcade
description: Sin descripción

name: Mother 3: Opposing Force
description: Mother 3: Opposing Force is a new story hack aiming to tell the tale of a mostly unseen side of MOTHER 3--that of the Pigmasks. Spread good will and happiness to the residents of Tazmily through ruthless tactics and planning, and top it all off with a relaxing night at Club Titiboo. This hack will take the player through key events of Chapters 4-7 from a uniquely porkish perspective.

name: 3D Puzzle: Japan
description: Collect a 3D puzzle, transferring things to the right places to create a beautiful house.

name: Keita's Adventures on the African Savannah
description: It tells the story of a young African boy, Keita, who follows migratory animals from the Serengeti National Park to the Masai Mara game Reserve to seek medicine for his family. On the way, he encounters dangerous wildlife.

name: The Wine Story
description: Become one of the biggest wine company in the world with this breathtaking story of young entrepreneur with small dream which comes through.

name: Cricket Captain 2022
description: Cricket management goes to another level as Cricket Captain 2022 puts you in control. A major re-design of the player aggression system provides greater realism, coaching options and analysis. Limited over matches have been remodelled to give greater balance and reduce collapses.

name: Search All: Bitcoin
description: Is a hidden object game in which you need to find all the bitcoins in a large location. Bitcoins will be located in a variety of places, from the most prominent to barely noticeable places

name: Equinox
description: Equinox is a free-to-play, fast-paced multiplayer arena shooter. Equinox mixes advanced movement techniques and projectile-based combat, producing a high-skill combat system. The game's objective is to capture the enemy's flag with adjustable team size, max score and match time.

name: Bee: The Knight
description: Bee: The Knight is a game with the theme of inertia. The player must control the bee carefully so as not to hit the wall. Experiencing that small mistakes lead to big falls, player will have a sense of tension and challenge at every moment.

name: Eschew
description: Eschew is a bullet hell action adventure where you play as an unknown alien visitor, traveled to Earth in search of a stolen, cosmic power source. Survive the overwhelming onslaught of Earth's military might!

name: Bewbewbew
description: Bewbewbew is a lovingly crafted, unique, and colorful action-arcade game!

name: Zerocron
description: Zerocron is a straightforward, classical arcade Twin-Stick Shoot-Em-Up with a strong Commodore-Amiga-era feel. Blast asteroids and enemies to burning pixeldust!

name: The Witch's Garden
description: The Witch’s Garden is a relaxing, slice-of-life gardening and crafting game.

name: Supaplex Hard
description: Complexity and speed!

name: Cummy Bender
description: Korra has found herself in a whole heap of debt. Luckily you, her new manager, has a few ideas on how to get her out of it. Lead Korra out of debt and on to the path of corruption by pressuring her to take riskier and riskier jobs to earn cash quickly.

name: Card Battle Simulator
description: Dive into the world of customizable card games! Whether you're a player seeking new challenges or an aspiring creator, this is for you.

name: Forsaken AR: Darkest Delivery
description: Forsaken AR is a fanmade mod that continues Five Nights at Freddys AR where Illumix left off. Forsaken AR adds a ton of new features and content to the game, while keeping the best parts of FNaF AR.

name: Haunted Vlogs
description: Two teenagers, a vlogger and her cameraman, go to explore an abandoned college, searching for clues and, eventually, an exit. There is a small tension between them. Will they tell their feelings before it's too late?

name: Memory Puzzle: Futanari Doctor
description: Train your brain with this memory game, revealing the naughty sexual adventures of a young couple and their Futanari doctor, in images hidden behind pairs of cards which you have to match.

name: Matthiola Reverie Verse: Lost Island
description: This is a love story about a girl who is bullied and how she survives in this seemingly isolated world. Players can experience the situation of an isolated student and how she interacts with others at school.

name: Survivor Legends
description: Hack & slash roguelike game

name: Eternal Pinball RPG
description: Level up and equip your hero in this unique Pinball-RPG mashup. Beat everybody on the online leaderboards and unlock the dungeon table to find rare artifacts to complete your collection.

name: Spyer
description: Denny, a government spy, is assigned to investigate a remote area where there is supposed to be a terrorist group. Upon arriving at the scene, Denny comes across several armed individuals, and finds possibly the largest base of the terrorist group.

name: Sanction
description: Sanction is a procedurally generated post-apocalyptic world where you are a prisoner sanctioned to come from the safety of your doomsday bunker to gather supplies for the community. Your freedom and your communities lively-hood relies on you. Survive the worn-torn wasteland left from the final war.

name: Immortal life of Confucius
description: A rpg game of history. Here, you can experience: free and open world, underground city exploration, solving puzzles, looking for legendary equipment, and playing with famous figures in history. Pixel image, story line driven by text.

name: 100 Hidden Hares
description: 100 Hidden Hares is a hidden object game in the winter setting. Black and white hand-drawn graphics in a cartoon style. Ultra hard! Very difficult!

name: LumbearJack
description: Grab your axe and save the environment by chopping and recycling every man-made thing in your path and solving puzzles with your charming animal friends!

name: The Triumphant Return of Diabolos
description: A turn-based RPG with an Active Time Battle system. Many years after humanity came together to defeat a powerful demon, a young man trains to become an imperial knight. One day however, he is confronted by a mysterious figure who says, "We have been waiting for you, Demon Lord."

name: Hero Siege: Pocket Edition
description: A port for Android/IOS devices.

name: Light
description: A simple shape platformer.

name: Manatsu no Zangai
description:
I'm about to lose consciousness.
I'm somewhere between dreams, delusions, and reality.
I don't know what is real, what is a dream, and what is a delusion.
Is the dusty classroom I'm in real?
My memory is ambiguous. Where am I now?

"Hey, are you okay?"

There was a boy calling out to me.
He was such a beautiful boy that I couldn't believe that he was real.
I didn't know if this boy was real or my delusion.

name: Rakugaki Mario
description:
Rakugaki Mario is a love letter / pastiche / new(?!?!?!) romhack inspired by many hacks from the 2007-2009 era. What originally started as a semi in-joke between friends spiraled out into a much larger project, with a much larger author pool contributing levels (for better or worse). Making this hack semi-unique in nature is, in persuit of MAXIMUM AUTHENTICITY, all tools, sprites, blocks, and music (barring resources made specifically for the project) are from 2007-2009 too. That's right, we're talking Lunar Magic 1.63, JonWill's Blktool, MikeyK's Sprite Tool 1.22, and Romi's Addmusic 4.04. Of course, this wouldn't be playable on hardware by default. To comply with SMWC standards, only the fixed version is available below (in both Japanese and English). It contains the usual modern hack fixes (FastROM, QoL adjustments, Blktool Optimizer, ect), but that doesn't mean it's any less difficult! For SNESGT and ZSNES enthusiasts, you can also play the original unfixed (Japanese) version through this handy link right here. One may be quick to compare this to one of my previous hacking endeavors, but this is a very stylistically different hack that goes in a different direction. If you were a fan of that hack, you may not be particularly pleased that it isn't a continuation / sequel, but I did try to throw a bone in a level or two. Regardless, I still expect this hack to be very difficult. An Author List for individual levels can be found here. Be mindful of spoilers!

Difficulty curve is practically nonexistent, and levels explore various design styles, so you'll never know what's next. Whilst tagged as a Kaizo hack, take solace in the knowledge that this is primarily a Standard: Very (Very) Hard hack. However, because certain levels are played in a style and way agreed upon today to be "Kaizo" (one hit kill, levels played in a strict way, and lots of trial and error), I felt it was a necessity to tag it as such for the unwitting moderator or player who wishes to tackle such a hack.

name: The Interval
description:
Agent Wells, it's time to prepare for your most dangerous and critical mission yet.
At 0600, your colleague and mentor Agent Cross, powered up the Time Interval Device and made an unsanctioned jump into the distant past. Her motives are unclear, but given her combat skills and precognition, she could irreparably alter the course of human history, in direct violation of the Institute's pursuits.Your mission: to find and eliminate Agent Cross, wherever and whenever she may hide.To avoid exposing past humans to our advanced technology, you must deploy unarmed and scavenge equipment on-site.
We have every confidence in your success, upon which our continued existence depends. Good luck, Agent. Commencing time-jump in 3... 2... 1..."

The Interval was made in 2022 during the month of May for the first Reload Magazine Game Jam.

name: Virgil's Purgatory EX
description: Virgil's Purgatory EX is an expanded port of the ZX Spectrum version of the game for the MSX, with an updated level design, two new areas, an extra boss, and much more.

name: Digimon: Digital Heroes
description: A Digimon platformer fan-game. You can play as every (partner) digimon from the original Adventure & Adventure 02! Each character is able to perform a physical attack and a ranged skill. Most of them also have abilities like flight or swimming.

name: NFT Museum
description: You are the proud owner of NFT, but there is nowhere to display them in a nice environment? Get N.F.T Museum, load a copy of your NFT, and place them in a museum! You can also import files from your computer.

name: Naruto to Boruto: Shinobi Striker - Master Character Training Pack: Madara Uchiha
description:
A special training pack for your avatar!

Featured in this "Master Character Training Pack" is Madara Uchiha (Six Paths)!
Purchasing this DLC will make him available as a master at the Ninjutsu Library, ready to offer Ninjutsu training.

Train with Madara (Six Paths) to acquire Training Points that can be used to unlock a variety of Ninjutsu and costumes for your avatar!

name: Poop Killer II
description:
"Poop Killer 2" is a comedy game mixed with trash horror from the 80's and 90's. Inspired by old movies involving marijuana and a lot of shit. It's a short game with the objective to amuse the player, it contains 2 simple endings.

Billy is a marijuana dealer and lives with his friend Jamal in an apartment. They sell and smoke a lot of weed... After your friend takes a shit in your toilet... the poop killer comes to visit you.

name: Parachute 22
description: Get the parachuters or they'll get you

name: Ninja Break: Head to Head
description: Sin descripción

name: Cool Kid Cody: Season 1 - Episode 10
description: Season 1 Episode 10: Godfellas! The weekend is over and it’s time for Pizza Boi and School Kid Cody to face Crescent High as a newborn Cool Kid and Loser!

name: Prison Life Simulator 2022: World Fight Battle GTA Ultimate
description: Simulator with a third-person view. The game takes place in a jail, after a failed bank robbery and a city chase, you arrested for 7 years.

name: Streamer Future Wars
description: Third gacha game by TsuKy Games. Gather completely unique streamer heroes, train and awaken them and upgrade their weapons. Also possibly with battlepass and pay to feed devs darklight battlepass. However you can collect all the heroes and beat everything in the game for completely free!

name: Coloring Pixels: Summer Pack
description: This Summer themed book unlocks 20 additional levels for Coloring Pixels! The season of Summer has been brought to life in pixel art for you to enjoy all year round!

name: Ecstatic
description: Mouse-controlled Bullet-hell with a Spider mech that freezes time and shoots rockets out of its butt, against Drones synced to rave music.

name: Idle Moon Rabbit: AFK RPG
description: A role-playing video game where you control Lyn, a moon rabbit whose goal is to recover the Moonlight to end the darkness that plagues her world.

name: Brigadoon: The Quest of Time
description: Based off the original book and musical written by Alan Jay Lerner comes a brand new indie title inspired by the ever-popular The Legend of Zelda: Majora's Mask! It follows a similar formula with a time cycle forcing you to do a set of tasks at a certain time in order to make progress. The game takes place in Scotland where a visitor named Tommy Albright from New York was on a hunting trip but gets lost, and finds himself stuck in the land of Brigadoon, which is cursed to appear for one day and disappear for 100 years! Help Tommy learn the secrets of Brigadoon and break the spell so he can escape! Help NPCs in a number of quests! Solve puzzles and unlock secrets! This game will have many surprises along the way, so it's guaranteed to be a blast!

name: Titanic II: Orchestra for Dying at Sea
description: Tragedy is comedy & comedy is tragedy. In this allegorical game, sacrifice your life to save the one you love from drowning in the icy waters of the Atlantic, sink to the bottom of the ocean floor and experience the strange, eccentric, haunting world between life and death, memory and reality.

name: Poinpy
description:
Available exclusively for Netflix members.

Bounce up, dodge adorable baddies and feed the blue beast that's hot on your heels. A vertical climber from the creator of the award-winning Downwell.

Keep going higher and higher because new and more challenging areas await. Earn and unlock abilities that will help you jump into your next run with a better shot at reaching the end.

name: Humankind: Cultures of Latin America
description: The Humankind Cultures of Latin America DLC includes:- 6 New Cultures - 6 New Wonders- 9 Independent Peoples- 15 Narrative Events- 30+ New in-game themed music tracks composed by Arnaud Roy

name: Metal Max Xeno Reborn: Digital Deluxe Edition
description: Explore a vast wasteland Traverse the deadly ruins of Tokyo Bay which remains teeming with mechanical beasts hell-bent on hunting humanity to extinction. Travel and battle in a tank or on foot to uncover the mysteries that lay buried beneath the sands.

name: Enter the Cum
description: She lives alone on a space station. However, nothing prevents this fiery space adventurer from inviting some friends to a raunchy party full of explicit sex and pornography.

name: Futsuma Shoujo Charlotte
description: Mizuki Konoe, also known as Exorcist Charlotte, lived among others using a disguise. Explore an abandoned factor and fight off the devils! Exorcist heroine RPG!!

name: Geballer
description: In this mouse-only Bullet Hell, you create your own problems! Featuring unique and strange bullets, different gameplay modes, extreme secrets and even a level editor, Geballer wants to softly stimulate the reptilian part of your brain until you disappear completely.

name: Lewd Life with My Doggy Wife
description: After getting kicked out of the hero's adventuring party and almost passing out on the side of the road, karma rewards you with a rescue from a passing doggirl! Put all that stressful "fighting for your life" behind you, kick back and take it easy with a lovey-dovey doggirl today!

name: Quickerflak_Ruthlessmod
description: Quickerflak_Ruthlessmod is the standalone "pretty hard" expansion of the retro-hardcore minigame Quickerflak.

name: 6-Mon Adventure
description: Embark on an adventure with 6-mon the little robot. Take control of the robot and travel through a disused factory, avoiding falls, protecting yourself from projectiles and traversing dangerous levels to stop the activities of a crazy AI.

name: Realms
description: Welcome to Realms, a first-person shooter inspired by the rules and aesthetics of popular tabletop RPGs. Use The Die of Chaos along with your abilities and alternate gun fire to help Fortuna explore different realms and destroy any and all threats along the way.

name: Awake
description: Awake is an isometric puzzle game about a young girl named Aya who is suffering from insomnia. Aya must navigate various obstacles in her path as she moves between different planes of consciousness. Join Aya on her journey to explore the depths of her dreamscape and uncover the root of her anxiety.

name: Ashzel & The Power Dagger
description: Ashzel & The Power Dagger, is a Vampire Fantasy action-adventure RPG. Set in the Eerie, mysterious, dark, and sophisticated West Coast - a place where the Vampires of the West Coast are drawn into wonder, awe, and elegant drama.

name: Hentai Pussy 3
description: What could be more beautiful than hentai?

name: Cool Game
description: Traditional roguelike where you build your team to defeat stronger and stronger opponents. Choose your teammates, their position and your opponents wisely, as one mistake can cost you the entire game

name: Roomli
description: Welcome to the maze of Roomli, the only objective is to move forward. Fight room after room and collecting the 120+ items and 50+ enemies with multiple variants of themselves. The game gets progressively harder which becomes troubling with your limited inventory.

name: Shark Assault Simulator
description: I don't think you'd want to rest on that beach. Shark Assault Simulator is a game that shows us how dangerous it is to sunbathe on an unknown beach.

name: Fray Fight
description: Fray Fight is free! Battle the evil hordes on your way to Valhalla. Annihilate thousands of monsters with overpowered attacks and upgrades.

name: Zeus Quest: The Rebirth of Earth
description: Help Zeus save the planet in one heck of a crazy and hilarious family adventure. A classic point and click adventure game safe for kids. It combines Greek Mythology with Sci-Fi in a funny way!

name: Date Ariane Remastered
description: The original western dating sim updated and bigger than ever before. The first dating sim made with 3D rendered graphics became a viral web classic back in 2007. This new "remastered" version allows players to play as a male or female for the first time.

name: Ultimate Fighters
description: 2D Fighting game

name: Cropped
description: Cropped is a first-person action horror adventure - Survive the night as the farm you've arrived at has taken a turn for the worse...

name: AISZplus
description: You destroy the runaway electronic organ AISZ. Vertical scroll STG with all 5 levels.

name: Mortal Shell: Game of the Year Edition
description:
This edition includes the following:
- Mortal Shell [Game of the Year Edition]
- Steelbook
- The Virtuous Cycle DLC
- A3 Poster
- Holograph Postcards
- Limited Edition letter ( all numbered)

name: Master of Pottery: Suzhou Garden
description: Enjoy a quiet time by making pottery in the garden.

name: Zetria
description: Zetria is a pixel/retro style platformer with action and puzzle elements. Help Solana jump, shoot and think her way through the perils and dangers ahead to rescue the missing facility workers!There are nine levels in total, and a few secret areas to find and unlock too.

name: The Quarry: Deluxe Edition
description:
As the sun sets on the last day of summer camp, the teenage counselors of Hackett’s Quarry throw a party to celebrate. No kids. No adults. No rules. Things quickly take a turn for the worse.

Enjoy some extra teen horror flair with The Quarry - Deluxe Edition!

This Edition includes:

- The Quarry Full Game
- Deluxe Bonus Content Pack: ‘80s-themed character outfits, instant access to the Death Rewind system, Gorefest Movie Mode option, and Horror History Visual Filter Pack

name: One Last Memory: Reimagined
description: Re-discovers your own past and lost memories on this incredible journey through the nature while fighting your inner demons and fears.

name: Blind Wizard's Assistant
description: Blind wizards assistant is an unique turn based RPG where you play as an assistant to mighty but blind wizard. Collect elements, find recipes, craft potions to heal and eliminate monsters.

name: Please Fix the Road
description: Please Fix The Road is a colorful, minimalistic, laid-back and casual puzzle game in which it's probably not hard to guess... you're fixing roads! Your road repair doesn't have to be beautiful, it just needs to get the job done!

name: Meteor World Actor: Badge & Dagger
description: Superpowered detective noir. Maverick detective Ruka Hiryu pursues criminals by day⁠—and ices perps by night...

name: The Quarry
description: It's late summer in the remote forests of upstate New York, and the teen counselors of Hackett's Quarry have the camp to themselves for one final night. That means no kids, no adults, and no rules. In this thrilling cinematic tale, you control the fates of all nine camp counselors as their party plans unravel into an unpredictable night of horror. With life-or-death decisions around every turn, the choices you make will determine how the story unfolds.

name: Symphony of War: The Nephilim Saga
description: Enter Tahnra, a land savaged by war. You, a fresh academy graduate with humble beginnings, will grow to lead a grand army against a corrupt adversary. Gather heroes, form bonds, and lead your force in turn-based battles. Make use of tactics, terrain, morale and more to bring peace to the land!

name: Mario Strikers: Battle League
description: Introducing Mario Strikers: Battle League, a 5-on-5, soccer-like sport with no rules - do whatever it takes to win! Get gritty and try to score the most goals by tackling enemies, using items, and pulling off score-boosting special shots. Super Mario series mainstays like Peach, Toad, and Yoshi put their cleats (and stats) to the pitch and will stop at nothing to score. Customize your characters with gear that can augment their stats and appearance. Take the carnage online or pass the ball to players locally - just look out for the electric fence.

name: Sleepy Sheep
description: Welcome to the Dream World! Follow our protagonist Nicole Armatti as she gets to explore a place completely built off her own subconscious. Meet friends, foes, and explore a plethora of colorful settings as Nicole travels deeper and deeper into her own dreams.

name: Project Warlock II
description: Adrenaline-pumping gore retro funhouse that’s full of guns, magic, demons, vertical arenas, 3D visuals, 2D sprites, and heavy metal music.

name: Lands of Sorcery
description: Lands of Sorcery is a turn based combat RPG set in a time of virile men, ravishing women, creepy sorcerers and disgusting monsters. A tongue in cheek love letter to classic sword and sorcery literature and movies. To the death!

name: Freshly Frosted
description: Place conveyor belts to solve puzzles in the world's most adorable donut factory!

name: Calmed by the Dark: Purgatorium
description: Calmed by the Dark: Purgatorium is a dark-action roguelite dungeon crawler where your objective is to head to the top floor. Defeat the Gods of Infinity to acquire more power and progress further through the tower.

name: Love Yourself
description: Sin descripción

name: Good Job!
description: There's no real need to pretend and work anymore... Let's have some more fun and kill her.

name: Hot Wheels: Cyberpunk Customization Pack
description: Hypnotic rhythm, synthesizers, neon ... Where high technology and underground pop meet, the fantasy world of Cyberpunk emerges, all included in this extraordinary Customization Pack, featuring lasers and replicants.

name: Open the Door: A Short Story About Life
description:
It is a story of a small journey that doesn't take that long. Please pick it up and try to open the "door".
In "A Short Game of Opening Doors," you walk through a fantastic world and collect "Money" and "Delight" to open doors and move forward. The game is a 3D adventure game in which you walk through a slightly fantastical world, collect "Money" and "Delight", and try to open the door and move on. Don't worry, there are no difficult actions, ferocious monsters, or overly complicated puzzles. If you walk, the story will move forward as much as you walk.

name: Conqueror's Blade: Helheim
description: Master your fate in a legendary Seasonal Campaign inspired by the voyages of Viking raiders and Norse mythology. Conqueror's Blade: Helheim features two new units, reworked maps, mythical rewards, and so much more.

name: The Other Side
description: "The Other Side" is a puzzle horror game, where you secretly drill through a reinforced metal wall using a janky drill. You have to repair and maintain the drill throughout the process, using tools and other pieces of equipment to pinpoint and fix the issues that occur. Before you finally break through the wall.

name: Paragon Pioneers
description: Paragon Pioneers is a city-building idle game in which you discover, conquer and then build on islands to fulfill the needs of your inhabitants. Even with limited time to play you can enjoy this deep simulation game and follow one of the countless ways to optimize your empire. Build an impressive palace and go down in history as Paragon's most successful leader.

name: Dying Light: Definitive Edition
description:
Rove an infected world where only the strongest will make it. Master your combat skills to fight monsters of all kinds, both human and the undead. Parkour through the roofs, craft weapons, and help other survivors while you’re confronting your own nightmares!
Dying Light: Definitive Edition includes;
- Dying Light: the full award-winning game.
- Dying Light: The Following: a huge expansion complete with a new story, vast original map, and a customizable buggy to drive.
- Dying Light: Bozak Horde: a challenging game mode with its own side story.
- Cuisine & Cargo: two additional quarantine zones.
- Ultimate Survivor Bundle: exclusive weapons and outfits.
- Hellraid: a new game mode in a dark-fantasy setting.
- A large collection of skins and weapons that will make slaughtering zombies even more fun

name: Arcade Archives: Motos
description: "MOTOS" is an action game released by NAMCO in 1985. Take control of the MOTORSPANNER armored vehicle and ram all the SPACE BEES to knock them off the base. Choose from 2 types of power-up parts before starting a stage to increase your ability to push enemies, or to increase your jumping ability. Try to pick the one that suits that stage!

name: After the Fall: Frontrunner Season
description: From new maps, weapons and system updates, we have an update from the development team on what's coming up next for After the Fall!

name: Football Simulator
description: Moddable physics football game where you can struggle through and break tackles for first downs, juggle tipped passes and make diving interceptions. You can also be the cinematographer and create your own videos using the replay system or go on quests with players as the coach in RPG Mode.

name: Puzzles with Nature
description: In this game, you will find a huge variety of relaxing puzzles designed to train your brain. Start dragging the puzzle pieces to the right place until you form a whole picture.

name: Legend of Arcadieu Bundle
description:
The Legend of Arcadieu takes place in a mystical kingdom inside a video game. The story begins when you accidentally enter the game and become the great legendary hero. Now you need to find your way back home. With the help of a cute mage and a beautiful…

The bundle features both games, The Legend of Arcadieu and The Legend of Arcadieu 2.

name: Puzzle Bundle: Inbento & Golf Peaks
City Things
description: City Things is a 3D find and click puzzle game in which you have to find some items on the city location within a certain time.

name: Martial Story
description: "Martial Story" - a 2D platformer runner with classic game mechanics: run on platforms, dodge enemies, throw swords, balance in free fall, test your reaction against hundreds of enemies, train your accuracy in jumping in caves.

name: Pussy 5
description: "Pussy 5" is a hentai puzzle in which you need to move the elements vertically or horizontally to get the finished image.

name: Mailman
description: "Mailman" is a 2D old-school top down arcade game ported to PC. It puts you in the role of a postman who has to deliver all the letters to the mailboxes.

name: Pedro Land DX
description: An intense, retro run-and-gun platformer western game!

name: Roller Ball
description: Roller Ball is a 3D platforming game, inspired by Super Monkey Ball and Ball Race, dodge obstacles and smash through walls to get to the end of each level and find multiple ways to complete levels, has endless mode and infinite levels

name: The Office
description: The Office is a visual novel for adults only. In this game, you control a guy who just got a new job, but was late on his first day of work. His new boss is unhappy with this delay... The game is filled with sex scenes, humor, romance.

name: Kawaii Hentai Girls 2
description: It's a relaxing anime puzzle with cute kawaii girls. Solve puzzles, and enjoy high-quality artwork.

name: Breath of Ghosts
description: Breath of Ghosts is a first-person horror game made in realistic 3D graphics that immerses you in an atmosphere of horror and scares you in every way. The main goal is to survive and be saved.

name: Futanari Sex: The Gym
description: An explicit erotic visual novel following the story of a sexy futanari personal trainer taking the training of her sweet and oldest friend to another level…

name: Chance at Life
description: The events unfold in an old house built in 1876. Two friends returning from a party were caught in a storm. They had to stay in an abandoned house to wait out the bad weather. To survive, the friends had to unravel the secrets of the mansion, go after the one who is trying to help.

name: Sokocat: Combo
description:
Sokocat – Combo, brings two games from the series, Sokocat Islands and Sokocat Dungeon, a puzzle game that requires the player to push stone blocks to the correct position to reach the end of the level.

Sokocat Islands brings a tropical themed adventure; solve minimalist puzzles while listening to the sea and a relaxing soundtrack. Sokocat Dungeon, in the other hand, brings a mysterious adventure, Kitten Jone (the cat) now has to find artifacts in the dungeons of a castle.

Enjoy the Islands, avoid the traps in the Dungeon and keep pushing the blocks to the right spot to succeed. Hope this cat has 9 lives.

name: Cazzarion: Demon Hunting
description: Demons are troubling here. Kill the brood of evil and send it back to hell. Standard weapons (Assault Rifle, Shotgun) and special weapons (BoomShot, Reaper, ....) are available. As opponents, the demons of hell are fighting against you. Choose your weapon and shoot ("Groarrr.....BOOOOOM")

name: Square Keeper
description: Square Keeper is a puzzle game, based on a card system, where each card gives the player the possibility to execute different actions, like a sword swing, shooting with a bow or simply walking.

name: Neighbor Fight
description: Multiplayer first person strategy game with lots of destruction. Destroy the house of your neighbor by throwing furniture and build a business by selling weed!

name: Sinister Night
description: Sinister Night is a multiplayer, social deduction horror game combined with betrayal. Eight streamers came to an abandoned Gnostic school where a terrible murder happened, yet two of them have been possessed by the Corrupter. Once the Scarlet Dream started and piercing screams split the air, one player was lying in their own blood. Hidden under the Ghost, is it Satan incarnate or a wicked witch? Wraiths that died miserably are still wandering around in this school. They will tell you exactly what happened here. Find the Offering that stops the evil rituals, or execute the Corrupters hidden among you. Save your life from your destiny as the "Last Supper."

name: Tour de France 2022
description:
Fight for the yellow jersey in the official game of the Tour de France 2022. Experience the new online mode with weekly challenges and leaderboards.
In Solo mode, you can now deal with incidents (injuries, illnesses) during the 92 stages available.

name: Pro Cycling Manager 2022
description: Recruitment, budget, strategy: you make all the decisions. Explore the new system for detecting young potential, new options for customising your experience, a peloton that is more aggressive and much more.

name: Dungeon Raider
description: Endless Hack'n Slash Dungeon Crawler Runner with RPG and Adventure elements awaits in this critically acclaimed by us incredible breakthrough of immense proportions for the gaming industry and peace on earth, title.

name: Madshot
description: Madshot is a fast-paced, acrobatic, rogue-lite shooter. Survive the ever-changing road through Cthulhu. Equip endless upgrade combinations as you fight your way through horrific monsters and multi-phased boss battles.

name: Fight Ascending
description: Before participating in the world's number one martial arts conference, the martial artist 冰 decided to enter the puppet tower to improve hers martial arts... This is a fast-paced casual fighting game that challenges the levels randomly generated by the program.

name: Even if Tempest
description: Even if Tempest tells the story of a young woman called Anastasia Lynzel. Raised by her stepmother, Evelina, she had to face cruelty since a young age being usually forced to stay in the attic. One day her life changes forever as she gains a special ability called Fatal Rewind, which allows her to change the past. However, this skill comes with a catch: her fate will give birth to a new, possibly worse tragedy nonetheless. As she tries to break free, she will have the chance to become more intimately connected with four main characters.

name: CBS: Escape from the Mall 3D
description: Escape the mall, don't let the cargo stop you on your way!

name: The Lonely Helmet
description: In a galaxy far far away, there was a collection of helmets. Some were stronger than others, some were smaller and some were bigger, but all helmets had a purpose - to protect their space-human and allow them to breath outside of the Universe.

name: Nevergrind Online
description: Nevergrind Online is a real-time cooperative multiplayer online RPG where you and a group of adventurers join forces to protect the Kingdom of Edenburg from the sinister forces of darkness. Up to six players can form a party and venture forth to help restore peace and order to the Kingdom.

name: Basketing
description: Basketing is the youngest sibling of Volleying! Thus, as another physics-based game, it also gives the players more control over their moves, delivering unique matches each round. Invite your friends over or play remotely and enjoy this predictably unpredictable experience!

name: The Chase: Ultimate Edition
description: The Ultimate TV Quiz Show game is here! With Bradley Walsh and all SIX Chasers to take on, in the official game of the hit ITV game show.

name: Postal: Brain Damaged
description: Well I’ll be damned. Postal is now a Boomer Shooter?! Postal: Brain Damaged is a spin-off taking the most outrageous FPS series of all time into a different, skill-based, retro-shooter direction. The Dude’s about to deal some damage!

name: Builder Simulator
description: Builder Simulator is the perfect game for those who want to build a house, from the ground up, one brick at a time. On easy, the game will guide you step by step and allow you to learn by showing you full instruction, but on hard you will get no help - instead rely on your builder skills and make everything yourself.

name: Titan Saga: Chains of Kronos
description: Titan saga is an open world fantasy rpg, focused on deep customization of characters and town. Through tough choices, tactical battles and epic dungeons, you will experience an exciting and unique adventure.

name: The Cursed Heart
description: The Cursed Heart, Book 1 is the first book of The Cursed Heart series. It is followed by The Cursed Heart, Book 2.

name: Eighteen
description:
You awaken in a house that is not yours. You are haunted by a past that you hope is not yours. You are given a name that you fear can never truly be yours.

You are Tohya Hachijo.

...Or are you?

In this short interactive experience, take control of an amnesiac looking to find his footing in the home of a strange woman, as he discovers his past -- or runs from it.

name: Starshine
description: Starshine is a limit removing wad for Doom 2 set in a techbase ripped from the earth and tossed into space! The goal was to make bases where rock and grass were still barely clinging along as they floated in the lonely void, perhaps after some disastrous teleportation experiment. It's mostly a visual theme and the gameplay is otherwise classic styled, so you won't have to worry about falling into the void while killing demons.

name: Four Nights at Omori
description: Four Nights at Omori is a mod that turns the game into a FNaF-styled survival horror.

name: I'm On a Watcher Duty 4: The Community Place
description: This time, we're in the community place. The place where people that like these community will be gathered. However, these community places are being haunted by anomalies and it's your job to take a care of it. Good luck fellow watcher.

name: PUBG: Battlegrounds - Season 18
description: PUBG: Battlegrounds players can expect some exciting changes, including the return of the original Sanhok map to Team Deathmatch Mode.

name: Hamster Valley
description:
It is a healing simulation game that allows players to develop the village while increasing the number of hamster companions.
And live a comfortable life within.

name: The Preservation Project
description: A Super Mario 64 ROM hack which aims to recreate the SpaceWorld 1995 demo of the game.

name: The Jumping Fries: Turbo
description: Join BIG F on his exciting journey through the kitchen and make him jump!

name: Star Wars Knights of the Old Republic Bundle
description:
The bundle includes:
- STAR WARS KOTOR: It is four thousand years before the Galactic Empire and hundreds of Jedi Knights have fallen in battle against the ruthless Sith. You are the last hope of the Jedi Order. Can you master the awesome power of the Force on your quest to save the Republic? Or will you fall to the lure of the dark side?

- STAR WARS KOTOR II: 5 years after the events of the award winning original, the Sith are on the verge of crushing the Old Republic. As a lone Jedi, will you follow the light side or succumb to the dark?

name: SailSim
description: This sailing simulator applies actual physics to simulate the behavior of a sailing vessel. This means you can actually capsize or sink a vessel if you are not careful. In some cases the simulator can even reproduce unpredictable results based on your actions, selected parameters and conditions.

name: The Way of the Badass
description: Join Scarlet, Princess of Badass, in her crusades against the takeover of aliens, monsters, hybrids, and "Cancel Culture" as she brings toughness back to humanity. Lead desperate allies, from a Nazi to a hobo and other Special Ed students, in liberating humankind from the satire of the Far Left.

name: Psycho-Jirai In Love
description: A simulation of an outcast romance!

name: Call to Arms: Gates of Hell - Talvisota
description: The Talvisota expansion for CtA - GoH offers Finland and the unique northern fighting between 1939 and 1945, including a vast array of weaponry and unique game mechanics. The return of classic skirmishes also expands the Eastern Front with huge, replayable battles with a menacing, revamped AI.

name: Adventures at the North Pole
description: Look for snow-covered tracks, collect evidence at the site of abandoned parking lots, communicate with Eskimo leaders and shamans, and find out what happened to the ship "Silent", its crew and captain.

name: Under Siege
description: "Under Siege" is a top-down arena shooter. The player takes on the role of a fearless tanker. The goal is to survive in the arena and defeat all enemies.

name: Speedway Challenge 2022
description: Speedway Challenge 2022 is a 3D speedway game. Feel speedway emotions thanks to realistic riding physics. Play online mode with friends or local in career mode, league mode, challenges, tournament and quick matches. Are you ready for the challenge?

name: Pewt 'em Up!
description: Pewt 'em Up! is a retro inspired arcade space shoot 'em up with lots of upgrades, achievements, extras and more.

name: Project Sundown
description: Project Sundown is a first-person wave-based Zombie Shooter.

name: Over City
description: "Over City" is a vertical scrolling flying shooting game, jointly developed by independent game producers ying liu and nan yu, and published by heiheigame.

name: Chaotic Loop
description: Reach that gold medal in this colorful platform game! Or just do your best score!

name: MechWarrior 5: Mercenaries - Call to Arms
description: Call to Arms adds the Hatchetman chassis, along with 23 new melee-weapon focused 'Mech variants, 5 new melee weapon-focused Hero 'Mechs, 9 new melee weapons, and the new animated Stormsurge skin.

name: Spacewing War
description: Blast off for a retro shoot’em up experience filled with clever twists and secrets!

name: Ebanashi: Kaiwa
description: A scary picture. You may find this picture scary. You may think it is abnormal. Or there may be a picture that makes you happy.

name: The Cycle: Frontier
description: The Cycle: Frontier is a PvP Extraction Shooter driven by suspense and danger. While you search for resources & loot on an alien planet, challenging fights against other players & encounters with vicious creatures constantly threaten your survival & your spoils.

name: Brave Deeds of Rescue Team
description: Lead the emergency services, manage vehicles, coordinate various rescue workers and keep regular citizens safe.

name: Nummels
description: Nummels are dumb but predictable little guys. They’ll always interact with what’s in front of them, even if it’s a chewed up piece of gum. So toss them a ladder, dig a path, place a bridge, or blast a wall. Get them home safely in this medium skill platformer. Use your brain, they won’t use theirs!

name: My Lovely Wife
description: My Lovely Wife delves into the depths of a man’s grief after the sudden death of his beloved wife. Explore the notions of one’s willingness to do anything for love and the importance of letting go in this mix of dating, management, and alchemy simulators.

name: Outrunner: Complete Edition
description: Run through dangerous levels, jump through enemies and leave obstacles behind you.

name: PlayDoom
description: Sin descripción

name: Horizontal
description: A short horror experience for the Playdate.

name: Victory Unity
description:
A hack designed with the intent of capturing the experience of Zelda Ocarina of Time entrance randomizer in an SM64 romhack.
All levels in this hack are overworlds taken from other hacks.

name: WWE 2K22: Stand Back Pack
description:
The Stand Back Pack features The Hurricane, Stacy Keibler, A-Kid, and Wes Lee.

Each playable Superstar comes with their own MyFACTION EVO cards and bonus Booker T EVO and Seth Rollins Sapphire MyFACTION cards.

name: CanVerse
description:
Play hyper-realistic backgammon, checkers & chess with more board games coming soon.

Choose to take on your friends or computer competitors, with different levels of difficulty.

Local & online gameplay, with online support for 2 players & 62 spectators, with voice chat.

Welcome to CanVerse, the future of shared hyper-realistic tabletop gaming.

name: Minecraft: The Wild Update
description: Minecraft: The Wild Update is a major update to Minecraft: Bedrock Edition themed around "scary things" and natural wilderness. It introduces the deep dark and mangrove swamp biomes; ancient cities; mobs such as the allay, the frog, the tadpole, and the warden, as well as new items obtainable only in these new biomes.

name: Minecraft: The Wild Update
description: Minecraft: The Wild Update is a major update to Minecraft: Java Edition themed around "scary things" and natural wilderness. It introduces the deep dark and mangrove swamp biomes; ancient cities; mobs such as the allay, the frog, the tadpole, and the warden, as well as new items obtainable only in these new biomes.

name: Dungeons of Sundaria
description: Dungeons of Sundaria is an action-packed RPG where Heroes adventure through epic dungeons facing fearsome creatures either solo or with a group of friends. Master your class, loot everything, and destroy the foul creatures of the deep!

name: Dating My High School Bully
description:
High school isn't easy, especially when it comes to making friends. At Matsubara High, fitting in is harder than the schoolwork itself! Luckily, a popular girl invites you into her friend group, but you quickly learn she may have had ulterior motives.

Your new friends seems more interested in treating you like dirt for their own amusement than getting to know you. You struggle to appease her and her friend group, but is the struggle worth it?

name: LazuNight Funkin'
description: Step into the shoes of Pomu, who, in celebration of LazuLight's upcoming first year anniversary, will be rehearsing for their grand concert with her friends Finana and Elira in the hopes of giving their fans the best performance possible!

name: Minecraft: Java & Bedrock Edition
description: Create, explore, survive, repeat. Get Minecraft: Java Edition and Bedrock Edition as a package deal for Windows! With Minecraft: Java & Bedrock Edition for Windows, you can easily switch between games using the unified launcher and cross-play with any current edition of Minecraft.

name: The Dead Rooms
description: The Dead Rooms is an immersive horror experience with Roguelike elements. Can you survive? Explore a never ending world of rooms, as you push further into the Dead Rooms, trying to find what supplies you can and avoiding the monsters that call this place home.

name: The Jumping Fries
description: Join BIG F on his exciting journey through the kitchen and make him jump!

name: Dead by Daylight: Roots of Dread
description: When the dusk turns full dark, it comes. Dead by Daylight’s Roots of Dread Chapter features a new Killer – The Dredge – and a new Survivor, Haddie Kaur. A new map, the disturbing Garden of Joy, is available for all players.

name: The Search for Fran 2
description: Welcome to Sans Fran City. You are here to search for Fran, again. While searching, You can also talk with people and go on quests, collect glorbs, drive cars, fly a drone, crash cars, try a "challenge" and much more!

name: Meat & Greed
description: In the atmospheric puzzle-platformer Meat & Greed, you will experience the horrors of a slaughterhouse from the perspective of different animals. Solve riddles and collaborate with other animals to try and escape this ill-fated factory.

name: Pacifish
description: Pacifish is an incremental fishing management game with several mechanics to interact with and improve. It can be played both idly, or more actively to progress faster.

name: Space Theory
description: "Space Theory" - a space top down shooter game. The player controls a spaceship and fights against space pirates, blows up enemy space stations and acquires upgrades at the end of each mission.

name: Logica Emotica
description: An emoji infused puzzle game for you!

name: Jigsaw Puzzle: BDSM Room
description: Train your brain with this memory game, revealing the naughty sex adventures of a girl and futanari couple and their dominatrix, in images hidden behind pairs of cards which you have to match.

name: Robber Sam
description: Robber Sam - You have to take on the role of an ordinary man named Sam, who decided to become a robber.

name: Treats Please!
description: This is a retro-styled puzzle game about keeping a hungry pet happy with tasty treats. Choosing treats the pet will enjoy will reduce their hunger strength level and choosing things they cannot eat will only make them hungrier!

name: Another Side
description: Another Side is a psychological horror game with greater focus on the mystery of the plot and atmosphere than just cheap scares on the screen, brings a simple mechanics with greater purpose in its story, explore every corner, use logic and find paths to be followed.

name: AlchiMerge: Merge & Craft
description: AlchiMerge provides a twist to the Merge-genre where you also Craft, Sell and Decorate in your very own Alchemy Shop.

name: A Story of a Company!
description: Sin descripción

name: C&T
description: C&T is a Goofy Team-Strategy Multiplayer game where you play either as a cop or a thief in teams through a small town. Lets see who can rule between the crime and the law!

name: SpellForce III: Reforced - Complete Edition
description:
SpellForce III Reforced is a unique mix of an epic RPG storyline blended with accessible real-time strategy elements, designed to offer a riveting console experience to fans and newcomers alike.

Complete Edition includes:
- SpellForce III: Reforced
- SpellForce III Reforced: Soul Harvest
- SpellForce III Reforced: Fallen God

name: Acorn City: Tropical!
description: Build and Explore your very own tropical island! Use block-based building mechanics to create an island unique to you! Collect resources to survive and create. Unlock new items to help expand your town!

name: Unlife
description: Survive in a dark world destroyed by a nuclear war, where instead of land only the Black Ocean and its dangerous inhabitants. Navigate a submarine between ocean platforms, search for supplies, and rescue survivors. Try to find a ghostly way to escape from these nightmares!

name: Attack at Dawn: North Africa
description: Attack at Dawn: North Africa is an operational level wargame set in WW2 North African theatre. It features 3 campaigns, and 15 scenarios, which can be played in solo or multiplayer modes. It begins with the German troops probing into the Libyan region of Cyrenaica, and finishes either with the total defeat of German-Italian Panzer Armee, or with the British loss of Egypt and their retreat across the Suez Canal.

name: The Last Taxi
description: Conversations at the end of the world. You are the last human taxi driver in a desperate future where the last remains of civilization are propped up by surveillance, automation and human modification. The hours are long, and the pay is terrible - but hey, at least you have a job!

name: Justice.exe
description: Justice.exe is a dialogue-heavy dystopian legal drama in which you defend sentient AI in court. Discover key story elements in dialogue, build your case by studying arguments, and engage the opposing counsel in wits, charisma and skullduggery. Small choices might alter the fate of your clients.
